224a3(mdo 'grel): bzlog par bya ba lta ba rnams skye ba'i rgyu dmigs pa rgyu mtshan dngos po thams cad las phyi rol tu gyur pa/ de yang gang zhig yod de/ don thams cad dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid yin la
224a4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir don de dag thams cad ma dmigs pas/ lta ba gang dag gang du gang la ni/ /ci las kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /te/ gang dag kyang ma yin la/ gang du yang ma yin zhing/ gang la yang ma yin la/
224a5(mdo 'grel): rgyu gang las kyang 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /de dag yod pa ma yin na ni rtag pa nyid 'thad pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir lta ba de dag ni mi rigs pa nyid do/ /ji skad du mdo las gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis/ de ltar
224a6(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ rtag pa rgyun tu srog med pa dang ji lta ba nyid dang ma nor ba nyid dang ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang ma byas pa dang/ 'dus ma byas pa dang thogs pa med pa dang sgrib pa med pa
224a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ zhi ba dang 'jig pa med pa dang mi 'phrogs pa dang zad pa med pa dang/ rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba dang/ med pa dang gsag dang gso ba dang snying po med pa dang/ nad dang 'bras dang zug rdu dang/ sdig pa dang
224b1(mdo 'grel): ni rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med par yang dag bar rjes su mthong ba de ni/ ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam/ 'on te bdag 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig /bdag 'das pa'i dus na cir gyur ba zhig /bdag 'das pa'i dus
224b2(mdo 'grel): na ji lta bur gyur pa zhig snyam du sngon gyi mdza' la brten par mi byed do/ /ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ /'o na te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur /ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni cir 'gyur/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji lta bu
224b3(mdo 'grel): zhig tu 'gyur snyam du phyi ma'i mdza' la brten par mi byed do/ /'di ci zhig/ 'di ji lta bu zhig /ci zhig /cir 'gyur/ sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs /de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes da ltar byung ba la yang brten
224b4(mdo 'grel): par mi byed do/ /'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gi lta bar song ba gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ bdag tu smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ sems can du smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ /srog tu smra ba dang ldan ba 'am/ gang zag tu smra ba
224b5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa 'am/ /dge mtshan dang bkra shis su smra ba dang ldan pa dag kyang rung ste/ /lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba de dag /de'i tshe ni des spangs par 'gyur te/ yongs su shes nas/ rtsa ba nas
224b6(mdo 'grel): bcad de ta la'i mgo bzhin mi snang ba'i rang bzhin du/ phyis mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
224b7(mdo 'grel): bshad pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang ste/ sten las langs te dngong? ngo zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de'i phyir de ltar/ gang gis thugs brtse nyer bzung nas/ lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos ni bstan mdzad pa/ /gau tam de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la 
225a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa spang ba dang 'thob pa'i dmigs pa'i g.yang sa las 'dzin pas na chos so/ /'phags pa dam pa rnams kyi chos ni dam pa'i chos te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mdza' dag zad par byed
225a2(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyis bsngags par 'os pa'i phyir ro/ /yang na chos bzang po ni dam pa'i chos te/ dam pa'i chos rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa/ rtag pa med pa/ chad pa med pa/ 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa don
225a3(mdo 'grel): tha dad pa ma yin pa/ don gcig pa ma yin pa/ spros pa nye bar zhi zhing zhi ba ste/ gang gis 'gro ba rnams la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas te/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti bzhed pa dang/ lan du phan 'dogs pa bzhed pa ma yin gyi/ thugs rje chen po
225a4(mdo 'grel): kho na la brten nas/ lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir bstan par gyur pa/ ston pa bla na med pa zla med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan ci zhig ce na/ gau ta ma ste/ drang srong gau ta ma'i rigs su 'khrungs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /slob dpon zla ba
225a5(mdo 'grel): grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba tshig gsal ba las/ lta ba brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o// //sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdo sde la sogs bden pa gnyis brten bstan pa rnam pa dgu /'jig rten
225a6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi spyod dor rgya cher gang zhig 'dir ni yang dag bsgrags gyur pa/ der ni 'dod chags bsal bar bya phyir gsungs pas zhe sdang zad par byed mi 'gyur/ /zhe sdang bsal bar bya phyir gsungs pas kyang ni 'dod chags zad par
225a7(mdo 'grel): byed 'gyur min/ /gang phyir nga rgyal sogs zang bya phyir gsungs pa des kyang dri ma gzhan mi 'joms/ /de phyir de ni ches khyab ma yin gsung de dag dang don chen min/ gti mug zad par bya phyir gsungs pa gang yin des ni nyon mongs ma
225b1(mdo 'grel): lus 'joms/ /nyon mongs mdza' dag gti mug la ni yang dag brten par rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /gang phyir rten 'byung gti mug de zad byed par mthong ste de ni de nyid yin/ /de nyid bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis dbu ma'i lam du yang dag
225b2(mdo 'grel): bsgrags par gyur/ /de ni thub pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin skur 'dod de ni stong pa nyid du brjod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs yin de ni rigs pa chen po yin no zhes kyang bsgrags/ /gang phyir yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams
225b3(mdo 'grel): kyis bstan gyur pa/ /de phyir de'i gtam shin tu rgyas dang bcas par thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' zhing/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras po blo bzang klu sgrub de yis gsungs rab ji lta bar/ /ga thos pa bzhin du mkhyen nas gus pas
225b4(mdo 'grel): bstan chos dbu mar gtso bo'i ngo bor bstan/ /skye bo gang gis rgyal ba'i bstan pa zab mo ma gtogs pa des rtogs phyir dang/ /gang dag thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung las gzhan du de gnyis bstan par 'dod pa dang/ /blo gros dan pa gzhan
225b5(mdo 'grel): gang gsung rab rnam pa gzhan du 'chad par byed gyur pa/ /de dag kyang ni bzlog par bya phyir mdza' gnyis sel ba'i bstan chos 'di mdzad do/ /klu sgrub sgra gcan 'dzin ni bzang po'i zhal snga dang bcas lhas kyang gsung rjes su/ /'brang
225b6(mdo 'grel): pas de yi tshul lugs dus ni yun ring zhig tu gsal bar bstan par mdzad/ /de yi slob ma bstan chos de la rnam par 'byed pas rnam nges blo ldan pa/ /rnams kyis kyang ni mu stegs ma lus pham byas thub mchog bstan pa
225b7(mdo 'grel): yun ring bshad/ /dbu ni don du gnyer ba 'ongs la thugs rjes dbu ni bcang de stsal mdzad nas/ /bde ba can du rgyal ba'i sras po klu sgrub gshegs par gyur pa nges mdzad pa'i/ /gzhung rnams dang ni slob ma'i tshogs de dag
226a1(mdo 'grel): kyang dus mang zhig na nyams par gyur/ /de nyid nyi ma nub pas deng sang gzhung lugs gsal po de ni gang na'ang med/ /da ltar 'jig rten phal cher rtogs pas sbyar ba'i don tsam la ni mkhas gyur la/ /dam pa'i
226a2(mdo 'grel): lam las ring zhig rtog ge'i chang 'thungs pa yis myos pa dang/ /sangs rgyas gzhung lugs thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i don nyid bral zhing 'khrugs pa'i tshe/ gang zhig skad cig tsam yang yid gnyis bsal nas stong
226a3(mdo 'grel): nyid rtogs te skal bar ldan/ /dngos po'i 'ching bas nyer sbyar bstan chos zhags pas dkris shing 'jigs pas bcang byas nas/ /dngos po'i ra ba mchongs te 'gro ba'i ri dags mkhas gang de ni chen po ste/ /de bltos
226a4(mdo 'grel): brtsams pas bdag la yon tan 'di med deng sang mi mkhas gang yin pa/ /de ched kho nar de las gzhan pa'i bstan chos 'joms pa'i 'grel 'di bdag gis byas/ /mdo sde kun las btus dang gtam bya rin chen phreng dang
226a5(mdo 'grel): yang dag bstod pa dang/ /'bad pas shin tu yun ring 'phags pa'i bstan chos las bstan tshig le'ur byas de dang/ /rigs pa drug cu zhes bya rnam par 'thag byas stong nyid bdun cu pa de dang/ /gang yang rtsod pa rnam par bzlog
226a6(mdo 'grel): pa bkod pa de dag kyang ni mthong gyur zhing/ /brgya pa la sogs de dag dang ni de bzhin mdo sde zab mo rnam mang dang/ /sangs rgyas bskyangs kyis mdzad pa'i 'brel pa mthong nas legs ldan byed kyis legs bshad gang/ gcig
226a7(mdo 'grel): nas gcig tu brgyud las 'ongs dang bdag gis rnam par phye las rnyed pa gang/ /de dag bsdoms te blo chen ldan rnams mgu bar bya phyir yang dag bstan pa yin/ /dpyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan rtog ge 'joms byed ?
226b1(mdo 'grel): gsal rnams la tshig gi ni/ /'od zer dag gis 'di na gnas don yang dag ma dkrugs dngos su gsal byed cing/ /'grel pa ches gsal 'di yang byed pa'i zla ba grags ldan 'di deng shar ba yis/ /'jig rten rnams kyi yid
226b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis mun pa stug po dag dang lhan cig sel ba yin/ /lung dang rigs pa la brten 'grel pa sdeb legs ma dkrugs tshig dang ldan pa 'di/ /blo bzang dang ldan rnams la nges par bsgrub par bya phyir gus par byas nas ni/ /bdag
226b3(mdo 'grel): gis bsod nams stong pa nyid ltar yangs par gyur pa gang zhig bsags pa des/ /'jig rten ma lus lta tshogs spangs nas spros kun chad pa'i go 'phang bgrod par shog /ston pa gau ta ma dang ni de'i chos la zhugs rdzogs pa'i
226b4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas mdza' dag dang/ /rgyal ba'i sras po'i tshogs dang de dag gis gsungs chos la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sangs rgyas gsung mdza' yas la blta phyir lus can rnams kyi mig gyur dbu ma ni/ /gang gis thugs rje'i sgo nas
226b5(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa'i klu sgrub de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// //bstan chos dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba/ mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs
226b6(mdo 'grel): rje mnga' ba/ ri mor bris pa'i ba drus ma la 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas/ sbyar ba yongs su rdzogs so// //gsung rab rgya mtsho bsrubs byung de nyid bdud rtsi'i snod/ /shes rab ces bya snang byed tshig
226b7(mdo 'grel): gsal rin chen sgron/ /bsgyur las dge ba gang bsags de yi nyi ma grags/ /lta thibs spangs te spros bral mkha' la 'gro bar shog/ kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbung/ rin chen spas pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'dabs su/ rgya gar gyi
227a1(mdo 'grel): mkhan po rtog ge pa chen po/ ma hA su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur/ phyis ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhan po ka na ka warba dang/
227a2(mdo 'grel): bod kyi lo tsA ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang/ gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/ /khungs rnams ji ltar grags bzhin bris/ /'grel pa sgra don bzhin bsgyur la/ /phyin chad skad gnyis 'byung
227a3(mdo 'grel): srid na/ /gzu bor byos la dpyad par rigs/ /yi ge pa ni bla ma'i ming can dag gis bris bkra shis// (` dbu ma la 'jug pa zhugs) // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ma d+hya mA ba tA ra kA ri kA nA ma/
227a4(mdo 'grel): bod skad du/ dbu ma la 'jug pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos sangs rgyas 'bring rnams thub dbang skyes/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs shing//
227a5(mdo 'grel): snying rje'i sems dang gnyis su med blo dang/ /byang chub sems ni rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyu/ /gang phyir brtse nyid rgyal ba'i lo thog 'di'i/ /sa bon dang ni chu dang yun ring du/ /longs spyod gnas la smin pa ltar gyur pa/ /de phyir thog
227a6(mdo 'grel): mar snying rje bstod par bgyi/ /dang por bdag tu mngon bar zhen gyur cing/ /dngos po rnams la bdag gis zhes bzung bas/ /zo chun rgyud ltar rang dbang med pa yi/ /'gro la snying rjer gyur gang de la 'dud/ /'gro ba g.yo ba'i chu
227a7(mdo 'grel): nang zla ba ltar/ /g.yo dang rang bzhin stong par mthong ba yi/ /'gro ba dgrol phyir snying rje'i gzhan dbang gis/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon pas rab smon zhing/ /gang gis sems ni rab dga' la gnas pa/ /de ni rgyal ba'i sras
227b1(mdo 'grel): kyi dang por brjod/ /de nas bzung ste de thob gyur pas de/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sgras bsnyad do/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs skyes te/ /'di yis kun sbyor gsum pa spangs par 'gyur/ /de ni dga' ba mchog tu
227b2(mdo 'grel): gyur 'chang zhing/ /'jig rten khams brgya g.yo bar nus pa'ang yin/ /sa nas sar gnon gong du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de tshe 'di yi ngan 'gro'i lam 'gag cing/ /so so skye bo'i sa rnams zad 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'phags pa brgyad pa bzhin
227b3(mdo 'grel): du bstan/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed dang pes kyang/ /thub dbang gsung skyes rang rgyal bcas pa rnams/ /bsod nams stobs kyis pham byas rnams 'phel zhing/ /ring du song ba'i blo yang lhag par 'gyur/ /de tshe de la
227b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs sangs byang chub rgyur/ /dang po sbyin pa nyid ni lhag par 'gyur/ /rang sha gtong la'ang gus par byas pa yis/ /nang du mi rung dpog pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur/ /skye bo 'di kun bde ba mngon 'dod cing/ /mi rnams bde ba'ang longs
227b5(mdo 'grel): spyod med min la/ /longs spyod kyang ni sbyin las byung mkhyen nas/ thub pas dang por sbyin pa'i gtam mdzad do/ /snying rje dman zhing shin tu rtsub sems can/ /rang don lhur len nyid du gyur ba gang/ /de dag gi yang 'dod pa'i longs
227b6(mdo 'grel): spyod rnams/ /sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i rgyur gyur sbyin las byung/ /'di yang sbyin pa'i skabs kyi nam zhig tshe/ /'phags pa'i skye bo dang phrad myur du thob/ /de nas srid rgyun yang dag bcad byas te/ de yi rgyu can zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur//
227b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro la phan par dam bcas yid can rnams/ /sbyin pas ring por mi thogs dga' ba thob/ /snying rje can dang snying rje med la yang/ /de phyir sbyin pa'i gtam nyid rtsa bar 'dod/ /ji ltar byin cig ces sgra thos sems las/ /rgyal
228a1(mdo 'grel): sras bde 'byung de ltar thub rnams la/ /zhi bar zhugs pas bde ba byed min na/ /thams cad btang bas lta zhig smos ci dgos/ /lus bcad ster zhing bdag gi sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzhan dag rnams kyis dmyal
228a2(mdo 'grel): ba la sogs pa'i/ /sdug bsngal rang rig nyid du mthong nas de/ /bcad par bya phyir de ni brtson par byed/ /sbyin pa sbyin bya len po gtong pos gtong/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i pha rol phyin ces bya/ /gsum po dag la chags skyes gyur
228a3(mdo 'grel): pas de/ /'jig rten pa yi pha rol phyin ces bstan/ /de ltar rgyal sras yid la rab gnas shing/ /dam pa'i rten la 'od chags mdzes gyur pa'i/ /dga' ba 'di ni nor bu chu shel bzhin/ /mun stug thams cad rnam par bsal nas rgyal//
228a4(mdo 'grel): dbu ma la 'jug pa las rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa dang po'o// //de tshul phun tshogs yon tan dag ldan phyir/ /rmi lam du yang 'tshul 'khrims dri ma spangs/ /lus ngag yid kyi rgyu ba dag
228a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pas/ /dam pa'i las lam bcu car gsog par byed/ /dge ba'i lam 'di lta zhig bcu char yang/ /de la klags te shin tu dag par 'gyur/ /ston ka'i zla ltar rtag tu rnam dag ste/ zhi 'od chags par de dag gis rnam mdzes/ /gal te
228a6(mdo 'grel): 'di ni khrims dag rang bzhin lta/ /de phyir de ni tshul khrims dag mi 'gyur/ /de phyir de ni rtag tu gsum char la'ang/ /gnyis blo'i rgyu ba yang dag bral bar 'gyur/ /skye po tshul khrims rkang pa chag gyur na/ /sbyin pas longs spyod ldan yang
228a7(mdo 'grel): ngan 'gror ltung/ /bskyed bcas rtsa ba yongs su zad pas na/ phyin chad de la longs spyod 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rang dbang 'jug cing mthun pa'i yul gnas pa/ de tshe 'di dag 'dzin par mi byed na/ /g.yang sar lhung bas gzhan dbang 'jug
228b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /de tshe de nas gang gis 'byin par 'gyur/ /de phyir rgyal bas sbyin pa'i gtam mdzad nas/ /tshul khrims rjes 'gro'i gtam nyid mdzad pa yin/ /yon tan tshul khrims zhing du rnam 'phel na/ 'bras bu nyer spyod chad pa med par 'gyur//
228b2(mdo 'grel): so so'i skye bo rnams dang gsung skyes dang/ /rang sangs rgyas la nges pa'i bdag nyid dang/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi mngon par mtho ba dang/ /nges legs rgyu ni tshul khrims las gzhan med/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho ro dang lhan cig dang/ /bkra shis sna nag
228b3(mdo 'grel): ma dang lhan cig bzhin/ /de ltar tshul khrims dbang byas bdag nyid che/ de 'chal ba dang lhan cig gnas mi 'dod/ /gang gis gang zhig gang la spong byed pa/ /gsum du dmigs pa yod na tshul khrims de/ /'jig rten pa yi pha rol phyin zhes bshad
228b4(mdo 'grel): gsum la chags pas stong de 'jig rten 'das/ /srid min srid pa'i dpal gyur rgyal sras kyi/ /zla ba las byung dri bral dri med pa/ /'di yang ston ka'i zla 'od ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba yid kyi gdung ba sel byed yin/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las dri ma med
228b5(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa gnyis pa'o// //shes bya'i bud shing ma lus sreg pa'i me/ /'od 'byung phyir na gsum pa'i sa 'di ni/ /'ong byang pa de bde gshegs sras po la/ /de tshe nyi 'od zangs 'dra'i snang ba
228b6(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /gal te gnas min 'khrug pa 'ga' zhig gis/ /da yi lus la rus pa dang bcas sha/ srang re yun ring dus su gcod byed kyang/ /gcod byed de la bzod pa lhag par skye/ /bdag med lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /gang gis gang
228b7(mdo 'grel): la gang tshe ci bcad pas/ /gang phyir de yis chos kun gzugs brnyan ltar/ /mthong ba'i phyir yang de yis bzod par 'gyur/ /gnod pa byas pas gal te der dkon na/ /de la dkon pas byas zin ldog gam ci/ /de phyir de dkon nges par 'dir
229a1(mdo 'grel): don med/ /'jig rten pha rol yang ni 'gal bar 'gyur/ /sngon byas mi dge'i las kyi 'bras bu gang/ /zad byed brjod par 'dod pa de nyid ko/ gzhan la gnod dang khro bas sdug bsngal phyir/ /sa bon nyid du ji
229a2(mdo 'grel): ltar khrid par byed/ /gang phyir rgyal sras rnams la khros pa yis/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bskal pa bye ba brgyar/ /bsags pa skad cig gis 'joms de yi phyir/ /mi bzod las gzhan sdig pa yod ma yin/ /mi sdug gzugs byed
229a3(mdo 'grel): dam pa min par khrid/ /rigs dang mi rigs rnam dpyod 'phrog byed cing/ /mi bzod pa yis myur du ngan 'gror sgyur/ /bzod pas bshad zin dang 'gal yon tan byed/ /mdzes shing dam pa'i skye bos 'dod pa dang/ /rigs dang mi rigs
229a4(mdo 'grel): shes la mkhas 'gyur zhing/ /'di las gzhan du lha mi dag tu skye/ /so so'i skye bo dang ni rgyal sras kyi/ /khro dang bzod pa'i skyon yon rig byas te/ /mi bzod spangs pas 'phags pa'i skye bo yis/ /bsngags pa'i bzod pa rtag tu
229a5(mdo 'grel): bsten par bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byang chub phyir bsngos kyang/ /gsum dmigs yod na de ni 'jig rten pa'o/ /dmigs pa med na de nyid sangs rgyas kyis/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i pha rol phyin ces gsungs/ /sa der bsam
229a6(mdo 'grel): gtan mngon shes 'byung 'gyur dang/ 'dod chags zhe sdang yongs su zad par 'gyur/ /des kyang rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi ni/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags 'joms par nus par 'gyur/ /sbyin sogs chos gsum de dag phal mo
229a7(mdo 'grel): cher/ /bde bar gshegs pas khyim pa rnams la bsngags/ /bsod nams zhes bya'i tshogs kyang de dag nyid/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi bdag nyid sku yi rgyu/ /rgyal sras nyi ma la gnas 'ong byed 'di/ /rang rgyud mun pa dang
229b1(mdo 'grel): por bsal byas nas/ /'gro ba'i mun pa sel bar 'dod pa yin/ /sa 'dir rno bar gyur kyang khro mi 'gyur/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa gsum pa'o// //yon tan thams cad
229b2(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus rjes 'gro zhing/ /bsod nams blo gros tshogs ni gnyis kyi rgyu/ /brtson 'grus gang du 'bar bar gyur pa yi/ /sa de 'od 'phro bzhi pa zhes bya'o/ /der ni bde gshegs sras la rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub phyogs lhag bsgoms
229b3(mdo 'grel): pa las skyes pa'i/ /snang ba zangs kyi 'od pas lhag 'byung zhing/ /bdag tu lta ba dang 'brel yongs su zad/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o// //spyang dka' i
229b4(mdo 'grel): sar gnas bdag nyid chen po de/ /bdud rnams kun gyis 'pham par nus ma yin/ /bsam gtan lhag cing blo bzang bden rang bzhin/ /zhib mo rtogs la'ang shin tu mkhas pa thob/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las spyang dka' ba zhes bya ba byang chub
229b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa lnga pa'o// //mngon du phyogs par mnyam bzhag sems gnas te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mngon phyogs shing/ /rkyen nyid 'di ba'i de nyid mthong ba de/ /shes rab gnas pas
229b6(mdo 'grel): 'gog pa thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar long ba'i tshogs kun bde blag tu/ /mig ldan skyes bu gcig gis 'dod pa yi/ /yul du khrid pa da bzhin 'dir yang blos/ /mig nyams yon tan blangs te rgyal bar khrid/ /ji ltar de yis chos zab
229b7(mdo 'grel): chos rtogs pa/ /lung dang gzhan yang rigs pas yin pas na/ /de ltar 'phags pa klu grub gzhung lugs las/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i lugs bzhin brjod par bya/ /so so skye bo nyad na'ang stong nyid thos/ /nang du dga' ba yang dang yang du
230a1(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /dga' ba las byung mchi mas mig gang zhing/ /lus kyi ba spu ldang gyur gang yin pa/ /de la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon yod/ /de nyid bstan pa'i snod ni de yin te/ de la don dam bden pa bstan par bya//
230a2(mdo 'grel): de la de rjes 'gro ba'i yon tan 'byung/ /rtag tu tshul khrims blangs nas gnas par 'gyur/ /sbyin pa gtong zhing snying rje brten par byed/ /bzod pa sgom zhing dge ba byang chub tu/ 'gro ba dgrol phyir yongs su bsngo byed cing/ /byang chub
230a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' rnams la gus par byed/ /zab cing rgya che'i tshul la mkhas pas ni/ /rim gyis rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob pas/ /de don gnyer bas lam 'di mnyan par gyis/ /de nyid de las 'byung min gzhan dag las kyang min/ /gnyis
230a4(mdo 'grel): ka las min rgyu med par yang 'byung ba min/ /de ni de las 'byung na yon tan 'ga' yang med/ /skyes zin slar yang skye bar rigs pa'ang ma yin nyid/ /skyes ba slar yang skye bar yongs su rtog na ni/ /myu gu sogs kyi skye ba thob par mi
230a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /sa bon srid mthar thug par skye ba nyid du 'gyur/ /ji ltar de nyid kyis de rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /byed rgyu sa bon gyi las myu gu'i dbyibs dang ni/ /kha dog ro nus smin pa'i tha dad med par 'gyur/ /gal te rang gi
230a6(mdo 'grel): sngar gyi ngo bo yongs btang nas/ /gzhan gyi ngo bor gyur na de nyid ji ltar yin/ /gal te sa bon myu gu 'dir gzhan ma yin na/ /sa bon bzhin du myu gu bzung du med pa 'am/ /yang na de bzhin de yang bzung du yod par 'gyur//
230a7(mdo 'grel): de yi phyir na de dag gcig par khas mi blang/ /gang phyir rgyu zhig na yang 'bras bu mthong ba'i phyir/ /de dag gcig ces 'jig rten pas kyang khas len med/ /de phyir dngos po bdag las 'byung zhes btags pa 'di/ /de nyid
230b1(mdo 'grel): dang ni 'jig rten du yang rigs ma yin/ /bdag skyes 'dod na bskyed par bya dang skyed byed dang/ las dang byed po gcig tu 'gyur na de dag ni/ /gcig nyid min pas bdag las skye ba khas blang bar/ /bya min rgya cher bshad pa'i nyes
230b2(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur phyir ro/ /gal te gzhan la brten nas gzhan zhig 'byung na ni/ /me lce las kyang mun pa 'thug po 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /kun las thams cad skye bar 'gyur de gang gi phyir/ /skye byed min pa kun la'ang gzhan nyid mtshungs  
230b3(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /rab tu bya bar nus pa de phyir 'bras bur des brjod cing/ /gang zhig skyed byed nus pa de ni gzhan na'ang rgyu yin la/ /rgyud gcig rtogs dang skyed par byed las bskyed pa de yi phyir/ /sa lu'i myu gu nas la sogs pa de lta
230b4(mdo 'grel): min zhe na/ /ji ltar nas dang ge sar dang ni ked shu ka la sogs/ /nus pa med dang rgyud gcig min dang 'dra ba min pa dag /sa lu'i myu gu skyed byed min par 'dod pas de bzhin du/ /sa lu'i sa bon nyid kyang de bzhin nyid de gzhan nyid
230b5(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /myu gu sa bon dus mnyam yod pa ma yin te/ /gzhan nyid med par sa bon gzhan du ga la 'gyur/ /des na myu gu sa bon las skye 'grub min pas/ /gzhan las skye zhes bya ba'i phyogs ni btang bar byos/ /ji ltar srang gyi mnga' gnyis
230b6(mdo 'grel): mtho dang dma' ba dag/ dus mnyam ma yin min par mthong ba de bzhin du/ /bskyed bya skyed byed dag gis skye 'gag 'gyur zhe na/ /gal te dus gcig yin na 'dir dus gcig med de/ /skye bzhin pa de skye la phyogs pas yod min
230b7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /'gag bzhin pa ni yod kyang 'jig la phyogs gyur pa/ /de tshe 'dir ni ji ltar srang dang mtshungs pa yin/ /skye ba 'dir ni byed po med par rigs ma yin/ /mig gi blo la rang gi skyed byed dus gcig pa/ /mig la sogs dang lhan
231a1(mdo 'grel): cig 'byung ba 'du shes las/ /gzhan nyid yod na yod la 'byung bas dgos ci yod/ /de med ce na 'di la nyes pa bshad zin to/ /skyed byed bskyed bya gzhan bskyed pa de rgyu yin na/ /yod med gnyis dang gnyis
231a2(mdo 'grel): ka min pa bskyed 'gyur grangs/ /yod na ci dgos med la'ang des ni ci zhig bya/ /gnyis la ci bya gnyis dang bral ba'ang des ci bya/ /rang lta la gnas 'jig rten tshad mar 'dod pa na/ /'dir ni rigs pa brjod pa nyid kyis ci zhig bya//
231a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan las byung ba'ang 'jig rten pa yis rtogs 'gyur te/ /des na gzhan skye yod 'dir rigs pa ci zhig bya/ /dngos kun yang dag mthong ba'i 'khrul pa yis/ /dngos snyed ngo bo gnyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /yang dag mthong yul
231a4(mdo 'grel): gang yin de nyid de/ /mthong ba 'khrul pa'i kun rdzob bden par gsungs/ /mthong ba 'khrul pa'ang rnam pa gnyis 'dod de/ /dbang po gsal dang dbang po skyon ldan no/ /skyon ldan dbang can rnams kyis shes pa ni/ /dbang po legs
231a5(mdo 'grel): gyur shes pa log par 'dod/ /gnod pa med pa'i dbang po drug rnams kyi/ /bzung ba gang zhig 'jig rten gyis rtogs te/ 'jig rten nyid las bden yin lhag ma ni/ /'jig rten nyid las log par rnam par bzhag /mi
231a6(mdo 'grel): shes gnyid kyis rab bskyod mu stegs can/ /rnams kyis bdag nyid ji bzhin brtags pa dang/ sgyu ma smig rgyu sogs la brtags pa gang/ /de dag 'jig rten las kyang yod min nyid/ /mig ni rab rib can gyis mthong
231a7(mdo 'grel): ba yis/ /rab rib med ces la gnod min ji ltar/ /de bzhin dri med ye shes spangs pa'i blos/ /dri med blo la gnod pa yod ma yin/ /gti mug rang bzhin sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste/ /des gang bden par mthong ba'i bcos ma
231b1(mdo 'grel): de/ /kun rdzob bden zhes thub pa des gsungs te/ /bcos mar gyur ba'i dngos ni kun rdzob tu'o/ /rab rib mthu yis skra bshad la sogs pa'i/ /ngo bo log pa gang zhig rnam brtags pa/ /de nyid bdag nyid gang du mig dag pas/ /mthong
231b2(mdo 'grel): de de nyid de bzhin 'dir shes kyis/ /gal te 'jig rten tshad ma yin na ni/ /'jig rten de nyid mthong bas 'phags gzhan gyis/ /ci dgos 'phags pa'i lam gyis ci zhig bya/ /blun po tshad mar rigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam kun 'jig
231b3(mdo 'grel): rten tshad min de yi phyir/ /de nyid skabs su 'jig rten gnod pa med/ /'jig rten don ni 'jig rten grags nyid kyis/ /gal te sel na 'jig rten gyis gnod 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'jig rten sa bon tsam btab nas/ /bdag gis bu 'di bskyed
231b4(mdo 'grel): ces smra byed cing/ /shing yang btsugs so snyam du rtogs des na/ /gzhan las skye ba 'jig rten las kyang med/ /gang phyir myu gu sa bon las gzhan min/ /de phyir myug tshe sa bon zhig pa med/ /gang phyir gcig nyid yod min de phyir yang/ /myug
231b5(mdo 'grel): tshe sa bon yod ces brjod mi bya/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid brten 'byung na/ de la bkur bas dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir/ /stong nyid dngos po 'jig pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/ /de ni rigs min de phyir dngos yod min/ /gang phyir dngos po 'di
231b6(mdo 'grel): dag rnam dpyad na/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dngos las tshu rol tu/ /gnas rnyed ma yin de phyir 'jig rten gyi/ /tha snyad bden la rnam par dpyad mi bya/ /de nyid skabs su rig pa gang zhig gis/ /bdag dang gzhan las skye ba'ang rigs min
231b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /rigs des tha snyad du yang rigs min pas/ /khyod kyi skye ba gang gis yin par 'gyur/ /dngos po stong pa gzugs brnyan la sogs pa/ /tshogs la bltos rnams ma grags pa'ang min/ /ji ltar der ni gzugs brnyan sogs
232a1(mdo 'grel): stong las/ /shes pa de yi rnam pa skye 'gyur pa/ de bzhin dngos po thams cad stong na yang/ /stong pa nyid las rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /bden pa gnyis su 'ang rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /de dag rtag pa
232a2(mdo 'grel): ma yin chad pa'ang min/ /gang phyir rang bzhin gyis de mi 'gag pa/ /de phyir kun gzhi med kyang 'di nus phyir/ /la lar las 'gags yun rings lon las kyang/ /'bras bu yang dag 'byung bar rigs par gyis/ /rmi lam dmigs
232a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i yul dag mthong nas ni/ /sad kyang blun la chags pa skye 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin 'gags shing rang bzhin yod min pa'i/ /las las kyang ni 'bras bu yod pa yin/ /ji ltar yul ni med pa nyid mtshungs kyang/ /rab rib can gyis skra shad
232a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par ni/ /mthong gi dngos gzhan rnam par ma yin ltar/ /de bzhin smin las slar smin min shes kyis/ /de phyir rnam smin mi dge nag po las/ /rnam smin dge nyid dge las yin mthong zhing/ /dge mi dge blo med pa thar 'gyur te//
232a5(mdo 'grel): mthong gi dngos gzhan rnam par ma yin ltar/ /las 'bras rnams la sems dpa' dgag pa mdzad/ /kun gzhi yod cing gang zag yod nyid las/ /phung po 'di dag 'ba' zhig nyi yod ces/ /bstan pa 'di ni de ltar ches zab don//
232a6(mdo 'grel): rigs par mi 'gyur gang yin de la'o/ /'jigs tshogs lta dang bral yang sangs rgyas kyis/ /ji ltar nga dang nga yi bstan pa ltar/ /de bzhin dngos rnams rang bzhin med mod kyi/ /yod ces drang don nyid du bstan pa yin/ /bzung ba
232a7(mdo 'grel): med par 'dzin pa ma mthong zhing/ /srid gsum rnam shes tsam du rab rtogs pas/ /shes rab la gnas byang chub sems dpa' des/ /rnam shes tsam du de nyid rtogs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar rlung gis bskul bas rgya mtsho ni/ /che
232b1(mdo 'grel): las chu rlabs 'byung ba de bzhin du/ /kun gyis sa bon kun gzhi zhes bya las/ /rang gi nus pa rnam shes tsam zhig 'byung/ /de phyir gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo gang/ /dngos po btags par yod pa'i rgyur 'gyur zhing/ /phyi rol bzung ba med
232b2(mdo 'grel): par 'byung 'gyur la/ /yod dang spros kun yul min rang bzhin yod/ /phyi rol med sems dper na gang du yod/ /rmi lam ji bzhin zhe na de bsam bya/ /gang tshe nga la rmi lam na yang sems/ /yod min de tshe khyod kyi dpe yod min/ /gal te sad tshe
232b3(mdo 'grel): rmi lam dran las yid/ /yod na phyi rol yul yang de bzhin 'gyur/ /ji ltar khyod kyis ngas mthong dran snyam pa/ /de 'dra phyi rol la yang mtshungs pa yin/ /gal te gnyid ni mig blo mi srid pas/ /yod min yid kyi shes pa kho na yod/ /de
232b4(mdo 'grel): yi rnam pa phyi rol nyid du zhen/ /rmi las ji lta bzhin du 'dir 'dod na/ /ji ltar khyod kyi phyi yul rmi lam du/ /ma skyes de bzhin yid kyang skyes ma yin/ /mig dang mig gi yul dang des bskyed sems/ /gsum po thams cad kyang ni rdzun pa yin/ /rna
232b5(mdo 'grel): sogs gsum po lhag ma'ang skye ba med/ /rmi lam ji lta bzhin du sad 'dir yang/ /dngos rnams rdzun yin sems de yod ma yin/ /spyod yul med cing dbang po rnams kyang med/ /'di ni ji ltar sad bzhin ji srid du/ /ma sad de srid de la
232b6(mdo 'grel): gsum po yod/ /sad par gyur na gsum char yod min ltar/ /gti mug gnyid las sad de de bzhin no/ /dbang po rab rib bcas pas blo gang gis/ /rab rib mthu las skra rnams gang mthong ba/ /de blo la bltos gnyis char bden pa des/
232b7(mdo 'grel): don gsal mthong la gnyis ka 'ang rdzun pa yin/ /gal te shes bya med par blo yod na/ /skra de'i yul dang mig ni rjes 'brel pa'i/ /rab rib med la'ang skra shad blor 'gyur na/ de lta ma yin de phyir de yod min/ /gang phyir mthong ba
233a1(mdo 'grel): dag la blo nus ni/ /smin med de phyir de la blo mi 'byung/ /shes bya yod dngos bral bas min zhe na/ /nus de med pas 'di ni 'grub ma yin/ /skyes la nus pa srid pa yod ma yin/ /ma skyes ngo bo la yang nus yod min
233a2(mdo 'grel): khyad par med par khyad par can yod min/ /mo gsham bu la'ang de ni yod par thal/ /gal te 'byung bar 'gyur bas bsnyad 'dod na/ /nus pa med par 'di yi 'byung 'gyur med/ /phan tshun don la brten pa'i grub pa ni/ /grub nyid min
233a3(mdo 'grel): zhes dam pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /gal te 'gag pa'i dus min las gyur na/ /gzhan gyis nus pa las gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyun can rnams der phan tshun tha dad yod/ /de phyir kun las thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ gal
233a4(mdo 'grel): te 'dir ni rgyun can tha dad kyi/ /de dag la rgyun tha dad med de'i phyir/ /nyes med ce na 'di ni bsgrub bya zhig /tha mi dad pa'i rgyun skabs med phyir ro/ /byams pa nyer sbas la brten chos rnams ni/ /gzhan nyid phyir na rgyud gcig rtogs min
233a5(mdo 'grel): te/ gang dag rang mtshan nyid kyis so so ba/ /de dag rgyud gcig rtogs par rigs ma yin/ mig blo skye ba'i rang nus gang zhig las/ /de ma thag tu de ni skye 'gyur zhing/ /rang gi rnam shes brten gyi nus de la/ /dbang po gzugs can mig ces
233a6(mdo 'grel): bya bar rtogs/ /'di na dbang po las byung rnam par rigs/ /phye bzung med bar rang gi sa bon las/ /sngon sogs snang nyid 'byung bar ma rtogs nas/ /skye bos phyi rol bzung bar sems khas len/ /rmi lam ni ni gzugs don gzhan
233a7(mdo 'grel): med par/ /rang nus smin las de yi rnam can sems/ /'byung ba ji lta ba de bzhin sad la'ang 'dir/ /phyi rol med par yid ni yod ce na/ /ji ltar mig med par ni rmi lam du/ /sngon sogs snang ba'i yid sems 'byung de ltar/ mig dbang
233b1(mdo 'grel): med par rang gi sa bon ni/ /smin las long ba la 'dir ci mi skye/ /gal te khyod ltar rmi lam drug pa yi/ /nus pa smin yod sad par med 'gyur na/ /drug pa'i nus smin ji ltar 'dir med ba/ /de ltar rmi tshe med ces cis mi rigs ji ltar mig
233b2(mdo 'grel): med 'di yi rgyu min ltar/ /rmi lam du yang gnyid ni sgyu ma yin/ /de phyir rmi lam du yang de dngos mig /rdzun pa'i yul can rtogs pa'i rgyur khas blangs/ 'di yi lan ni gang dang gang btab pa/ /de dang de ni dam bca' mtshungs mthong
233b3(mdo 'grel): ba/ rtsod 'di sel byed sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /'gar yang dngos po yod ces ma bstan to/ /rnal 'byor ba yis bla ma'i man ngag las/ /keng rus kyis gang sa gzhi mthong ba gang/ /der yang gsum char skye ba med par mthong//
233b4(mdo 'grel): log pa yid la byed par bstan phyir ro/ /khyod kyi dbang blo'i yul rnams ji ltar bar/ de ltar mi sdug yid kyis yang 'gyur na/ /de bzhin yul der blo gtad cig shos kyis/ /rtogs 'gyur de ni rdzun par yang mi 'gyur/ /rab rib dang ldan
233b5(mdo 'grel): dbang po can mtshungs ba/ /chu 'bab klung la yi dwags nag blo yang/ /mdor na ji ltar shes bya med de bzhin/ /blo yang med ces don 'di shes par gyis/ /gal te bzung med 'dzin pa dang bral zhing/ /gnyis kyis stong pa'i gzhan dbang
233b6(mdo 'grel): dngos yod na/ /'di yi yod nyid gang gis shes par gyis/ /ma bzung bar yang yod ces byar mi rung/ /de nyid kyis de myong bar grub ma yin/ /gal te phyi dus dran las 'grub ce na/ /ma grub bsgrub par bya phyir brjod pa yi/ /ma grub 'di
233b7(mdo 'grel): ni sgrub par byed pa min/ /rang rig pa ni grub la rag mod kyi/ /de lta'ang dran pa'i bran pa rigs min te/ /gzhan phyir ma shes rgyud la skyes pa bzhin/ gtan tshigs 'dis ni khyad par dag kyang 'joms/ /gang phyir gang gi yul myong gyur
234a1(mdo 'grel): de las/ /bdag las dran pa gzhan yod ma yin pa/ /de phyir bdag gis mthong snyam dran 'gyur te/ /'di yang 'jig rten tha snyad tshul lugs yin/ /de phyir rang rig yod pa ma yin na/ /khyod kyi gzhan dbang gang
234a2(mdo 'grel): gis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /byed po las dang bya ba gcig min pas/ /de nyid kyis de 'dzin par rigs ma yin/ /gal te skye ba med cing ma shes pa'i/ /bdag cag gzhan dbang ngo bo dngos yod na/ /gang gis na 'di yod par mi 'dod pa/ /khyod
234a3(mdo 'grel): la mo sham bus gnod ci zhig bskyal/ /gang tshe gzhan dbang cung zad yod min na/ /kun rdzob bden pa'i rgyur ni gang zhig 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi ltar na rdzas la chags pa yis/ /'jig rten grags pa'i rnam gzhag kun kyang brlag/
234a4(mdo 'grel): slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyi lam las ni/ /phyi rol gyur la zhi ba'i thabs med do/ /de dag kun rdzob de nyid bden las nyams/ /de las nyams pas thar pa grub yod min/ /tha snyad bden pa thabs su gyur ba dang/ don dam bden pa
234a5(mdo 'grel): thabs byung gyur pa ste/ /de gnyis rnam dbye gang gis mi shes pa/ /de ni rnam rtog log pas lam ngan zhugs/ /ji ltar khyod kyis gzhan dbang dngos 'dod ltar/ kun rdzob kyang ni bdag gis khas ma blangs/ /'bras phyir 'di dag
234a6(mdo 'grel): med kyang yod do zhes/ /'jig rten ngor byas bdag ni smra par byed/ /ji ltar phung po spangs nas zhir zhugs pas/ /dgra bcom rnams la yod pa min de ltar/ /'jig rten la yang med na de bzhin 'di/ /'jig rten las kyang yod ces
234a7(mdo 'grel): bdag mi smra/ /gal te khyod la 'jig rten mi gnod na/ /'jig rten nyid bltos 'di ni dgag par gyis/ /khyod dang 'jig rten 'dir rtsod gyis shig dang/ /phyi nas stobs ldan bdag gis bsten par bya/ /mngon gyur mngon phyogs
234b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /srid gsum rnam shes tsam du gang rtogs pa/ /rtag bdag byed po bkag pa rtogs phyir des/ /byed pa po ni sems tsam yin par rtogs/ /de phyir blo ldan blo ni 'phel ba'i phyir/ /lang kar gshegs mor?
234b2(mdo 'grel): de las kun mkhyen gyis/ mu stegs ri bo spo mthon 'joms byed dag /rdo rje 'di ni dgongs pa bcad phyir gsungs/ /ji ltar rang gi bstan bcos de de las/ /mu stegs rnams kyi gang zag sogs de dag /smras pa de dag byed por med
234b3(mdo 'grel): gzigs nas/ /rgyal pos sems tsam 'jig rten byed por gsungs/ /ji ltar de nyid rtogs la sangs rgyas bsnyad/ /de bzhin sems tsam gtsor gyur 'jig rten la/ /mdo las sems tsam zhes gsungs gzugs ni 'dir/ /'gog
234b4(mdo 'grel): pa de ltar mdo yi don ma yin/ /gal te 'di dag sems tsam zhes mkhyen nas/ /de las gzugs nyid dgag pa mdzad na ni/ /slar yang de las bdag nyid chen pos sems/ /ma rig las las skyes par ci phyir gsungs/ /sems nyid
234b5(mdo 'grel): kyis ni sems can 'jig rten dang/ /snod kyi 'jig rten shin tu sna tshogs 'god/ /'gro ba ma lus las la skye bar gsungs/ /sems spangs nas ni las kyang yod ma yin/ /'di ltar gzugs yod med kyi de la ni/ /sems bzhin
234b6(mdo 'grel): byed pa po nyid yod ma yin/ /des na sems las gzhan pa'i byed pa po/ /bzlog gi gzugs ni bkag pa ma yin no/ /'jig rten pa yi de nyid la gnas la/ /phung po 'jig rten grags de lnga char yod/ /de nyid ye shes 'char bar 'dod
234b7(mdo 'grel): pa na/ /rnal 'byor pa la de lnga 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzugs med na ni sems yod ma 'dzin cig /sems yod nyid na'ang gzugs med ma 'dzin cig /de dag shes rab tshul mdor sangs rgyas kyis/ /mtshungs par spangs shing mngon pa'i
235a1(mdo 'grel): chos las gsungs so/ /bden gnyis rim pa 'di dag bshig nas kyang/ /khyod kyi rdzas ni bkag par 'grub mi 'gyur/ de phyir de lta'i rim pas dngos gdod nas/ /de nyid ma skyes 'jig rten skyes rig bya/ /mdo
235a2(mdo 'grel): sde gang las phyi rol don yod min/ /sems nyid sna tshogs snang ngo zhes gsungs pa/ /gzugs la lhag par chags gang de dag la/ /gzugs bzlog pa ste de yang drang don nyid/ /'di ni ston pas drang don nyid gsungs shing/ /'di ni drang don
235a3(mdo 'grel): nyid du rigs pas 'thad/ /rnam pa de lta'i mdo sde gzhan yang ni/ /drang don nyid du lung 'dis gsal bar byed/ /shes bya med na shes pa gsal ba ni/ /bde blag rnyed ces sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /shes bya med na shes pa bkag 'grub
235a4(mdo 'grel): pas/ /dang por shes bya dgag par mdzad pa yin/ /de ltar lung gi lo rgyus shes bya ste/ /mdo gang de nyid ma yin bshad don can/ /rang don gsungs pa'ang rtogs nas drang bya zhing/ /stong nyid don can nges don yang shes kyis/ /gnyis las skye ba'ang
235a5(mdo 'grel): rigs pa ma yin gang gi phyir/ bshad zin nyes pa thog tu 'bab pa nyid phyir ro/ 'di ni 'jig rten dang ni de nyid duAng 'tha min te/ /gang phyir re re las skyes grub pa med phyir ro/ /gal te rgyu med kho nar skye bar 'gyur na ni/ /de tshe kun las thams
235a6(mdo 'grel): cad rtag tu skye 'gyur zhing/ /'jig rten pa dag 'bras bu 'grub phyir sa bon sogs/ /brgya phrag sgo nas sdud byed par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'gro ba rgyu yis stong na nam mkha' yi/ /utAl dri mdog ji bzhin bzung du med 'gyur na/ /shin tu bkra
235a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'jig rten 'dzin pa'ang yin de'i phyir/ /rang gi blo bzhin 'jig rten rgyu las byung shes kyis/ /'byung ba de dag bdag nyid gang zhig khyod kyir pra'i/ /yul du 'gyur ba de yi bdag can ma yin na/ /gang la yid kyi mun 'thug 'di nyid du yod
235b1(mdo 'grel): pa/ /des ni ji ltar 'jig rten pha rol rtogs par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pha rol 'gog pa'i dus su bdag nyid ni/ /shes bye'i rang bzhin log par lta ba rtag bya ste/ /de yi lta ba'i rnam pa'i brten mtshungs lus ldan phyir/ /gang tshe 'byung ba'i yid nyid
235b2(mdo 'grel): khas len de che bzhin/ /'byung ba de dag ji ltar med pa bshad zin te/ gang gi phyir na gong du rang gzhan gnyis ka dang/ /rgyu med skye ba thun mong du ni bkag zin phyir/ /ma bshad 'byung ba lta zhig yod pa ma yin no/ /gang gi phyir na bdag gzhan
235b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis ka las skyes dang/ /rgyu la ma bltos med pas dngos rnams rang bzhin bral/ /gti mug stug po sprin tshogs lta bus 'jig rten dag /bsgribs pa des na yul rnams log pa snang bar 'gyur//rab rib mthu yis 'ga' zhig skra
235b4(mdo 'grel): shad zla gnyis dang/ /rma bya'i mdongs dang sbrang ma la sogs 'dzin byed pa/ /de bzhin du ni gti mug dbang gis mi mkhas pas/ /blo yis 'dus byas sna tshogs dag ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /las ni gti mug brten 'byung gti mug
235b5(mdo 'grel): med bar de/ mi 'byung zhes byar mi mkhas kho nas rtogs nyid la/ /blo bzang nyi ma mun pa stug po rnam par bsal ba yi/ /mkhas pa dag ni stong nyid rtogs nas grol bar 'gyur/ /gal te dngos rnams de nyid du med na/ /tha snyad du yang
235b6(mdo 'grel): mo gsham bu ji bzhin/ /de dag med pa nyid du 'gyur de'i phyir/ /de dag rang bzhin gyis ni yod ce na/ gang dag rab rib can sogs yul gyur pa/ /skra shad la sogs de dag ma skyes pas/ /re zhig de dag nyid la brtsad byas te/ phyi nas
235b7(mdo 'grel): ma rig rab rib rjes 'brel la'o/ /gal te rmi lam dri za'i grong khyer bcas/ /smig rgyu'i chu dang mig 'khrul gzugs brnyan sogs/ /skye med mthong na yod med min mtshungs kyang/ /khyod la ji ltar der 'gyur de mi rigs/ /de nyid du 'di ji
236a1(mdo 'grel): ltar skye med kyang/ /mo gsham bu ltar gang phyir 'jig rten gyi/ /mthong ba'i yul du mi 'gyur ma yin la/ /de yi phyir na smras 'di ma nges pa'o/ /mo gsham bu la rang bzhin skye ba ni/ /de nyid du med 'jig rten du
236a2(mdo 'grel): yang med/ /de bzhin dngos kun rang bzhin gyis skye ba/ /de nyid du med 'jig rten du yang med/ /de phyir 'di ltar ston pas chos rnams kun/ /gdod nas zhi zhing skye bral rang bzhin gyis/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das par gsungs gyur pa/
236a3(mdo 'grel): de phyir rtag tu skye ba yong ma yin/ /ji ltar bum sogs 'di dag de nyid du/ /med cing 'jig rten rab tu grags par yod/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad 'gyur bas na/ /mo gsham bu dang mtshungs par thal mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir rgyu
236a4(mdo 'grel): med pa dang dbang phyug gi /rgyu la sogs dang bdag gzhan gnyis ka las/ dngos rnams skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ /de phyir brten nas rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir dngos po brten nas rab 'byung bas/ /rtog pa 'di dag brtag
236a5(mdo 'grel): par mi nus pa/ /de phyir brten 'byung rigs pa 'di yis ni/ /lta ngan dra ba mdza' dag gcod par byed/ /rtogs rnams dngos po yod na 'gyur ba ste/ dngos po ji ltar med par yod spyad zin/ /dngos po med par 'di rnams
236a6(mdo 'grel): mi 'byung dper/ /bud shing med par me yod min de bzhin/ /so so'i skye bo rnams ni rtogs pas bcings/ /mi rtog rnal 'byor pa ni grol 'gyur bas/ /rtogs rnams log par 'gyur ba gang yin te/ rnam par dpyod pa'i 'bras
236a7(mdo 'grel): bur mkhas rnams gsungs/ /bstan bcos la dpyad rtsod la chags pa'i phyir/ ma mdzad rnam grol phyir ni de nyid bstan/ /gal te de nyid rnam par bshad pa na/ /gzhan gzhung 'jig par 'gyur na nyes pa med/ /rang gi lta la chags
236b1(mdo 'grel): dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan gyi lta la 'khrug gang rtog pa nyid/ /de phyir 'dod chags khong khro rnams bsal te/ rnam par dpyod na myu du grol bar 'gyur/ /nyon mngs skyon rnams ma lus 'jig tshogs la/ /lta las byung par blo yis mthong gyur
236b2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /bdag ni 'di yi yul du rtogs byas nas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bdag ni 'gog par byed/ /za po rtag dngos byed po min pa'i bdag/ yon tan bya med mu stegs rnams kyis rtags/ /de dbye cung zad cung zad la brten nas/ /mu stegs can rnams
236b3(mdo 'grel): lugs ni tha dad 'gyur/ /mo gsham bu ltar skye ba dang bral phyir/ /de ltar gyur pa'i bdag ni yod min zhing/ 'di ni ngar 'dzin rten duAng mi rigs la/ 'di ni kun rdzob tu yang yod mi 'dod/ /gang phyir bstan bcos bstan bcos las
236b4(mdo 'grel): de'i khyad/ /mu stegs rnams kyis gang bstan de kun la/ /rang grags ma skyes gtan tshigs kyis gnod pa/ /de phyir de khyad kun kyang yod ma yin/ /de phyir phung po las gzhan bdag med de/ /phung po ma gtogs de 'dzin ma grub phyir//
236b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten ngar 'dzin blo yi brten du yang/ /mi 'dod de mi shes pa'ang bdag lta'i phyir/ /gang dag dud 'gror bskal mang bskyal gyur pa/ /des kyang ma skyes rtag 'di ma mthong la/ /ngar 'dzin de dag la yang 'jug mthong ste/ des
236b6(mdo 'grel): na phung po las gzhan bdag bka' med/ /phung po las gzhan bdag grub med pa'i phyir/ bdag lta'i dmigs pa phung po kho na'o/ /kha cig bdag lta'i brten du phung po ni/ /lnga char yang 'dod kha cig sems shig'dod/ /gal te
236b7(mdo 'grel): phung po bdag na gang phyir de/ mangs pas bdag de dag kyang mang por 'gyur/ /bdag ni rdzas su 'gyur zhing der lta ba/ /rdzas la 'jug pas phyin ci log mi 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das tshe nges par bdag chad 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das sngon
237a1(mdo 'grel): skad cig dag la ni/ /skye 'jig byed po med pas de 'bras med/ /gzhan gyis bsags la gzhan gyis za bar 'gyur/ /rgyud gcig yin pas skyon de med ce na/ /rgyud gcig nyid la nyes pa bshad zin to/ /de
237a2(mdo 'grel): phyir phung po dang sems bdag mi rigs/ /'jig rten mdza' dang ldan sogs med phyir/ /khyod kyi rnal 'byor bdag med mthong ba la/ /de tshe nges par dngos rnams med par 'gyur/ /rtag bdag spong na de tshe de yi phyir/ /khyod kyi
237a3(mdo 'grel): sems sam phung po bdag mi 'gyur/ /khyod kyis rnal 'byor bdag med mthong ba yis/ /gzugs sogs de nyid rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing/ /gzugs la dmigs nas 'jug phyir 'dod tshogs sogs/ /skye 'gyur de yi
237a4(mdo 'grel): ngo bo rtogs med phyir/ /gang phyir ston pas phung po bdag go zhes/ /gsungs pa de phyir phung po bdag 'dod na/ /de ni phung las gzhan bdag 'gog pa ste/ /gzugs bdag min sogs mdo gzhan gsungs phyir ro/ /gang
237a5(mdo 'grel): phyir gzugs tshor bdag min 'du shes kyang/ /ma yin 'du byed rnams min rnam shes kyang/ /min par mdo gzhan las gsungs de yi phyir/ /mdor bstan phung po bdag ces bzhed ma yin/ /phung po bdag ces brjod tshe phung rnams
237a6(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /tshogs pa yin gyi phung po'i ngo bo min/ /mgon min 'dul ba 'am dbang po nyid kyang min/ /de med phyir de tshogs pa ma yin no/ /de tshe de yi yan lag tshogs gnas rnams/ /shing rta nyid 'gyur shing rta dang bdag mtshungs/ /mdo
237a7(mdo 'grel): las phung po brten nas yin gsungs pa/ de phyir phung po 'dus tsam bdag ma yin/ /dbyibs so zhe na gzugs can la yod pas/ /de dag nyid la bdag ces khyod 'dod kyi/ /sems la sogs pa 'dus pa'i ngo bo ni/ /bdag min
237b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te de la dbyibs med phyir/ /nye bar len po blangs bya dngos gcig tu/ /mi rigs las dang byed po gcig 'gyur phyir/ /byed po med la las ni yod ce na/ /ma yin byed pa med las min phyir ro/ /gang phyir thub pas bdag nges sa chu ma
237b2(mdo 'grel): rlung dang rnam shes nam mkha' zhes bya ba/ /khams drug dang ni mig sogs reg pa yi/ /rten drug dag la brten nas nyer bstan zhing/ /sems dang sems byung chos rnams nyer bzung nas/ /nges gsungs de phyir de ni de ni de rnams dang/ /de nyid ma yin
237b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs tsam nyid min te/ /de phyir de dag rnams la dar mi rigs/ /bdag med rtogs tshe rtag pa'i bdag spong zhing/ 'di ni dar 'dzin rten duAng mi 'dod pa/ /de phyir bdag med shes pas bdag lta ba/ /cis kyang 'byin zhes smra ba shin tu mtshan
237b4(mdo 'grel): rang khyim rtsig phug sbrul gnas mthong bzhin du/ /'di na glang chen med ces dogs bsal te/ /sbrul gyi 'jigs pa'ang spong bar byed pa ni/ kye ma gzhan gyi gnam par gyur nyid do/ /phung por bdag yod ma yin bdag la yang/ /phung po
237b5(mdo 'grel): de rnams yod min gang gi phyir/ /gzhan nyid yod na rtog pa 'dir 'gyur na/ /gzhan nyid de med de phyir 'di rtog pa'o/ /bdag ni gzugs dang ldan min med pa'i phyir/ /de phyir dan don sbyor ba med pa can/ /gzugs can tha dad tha
237b6(mdo 'grel): dang min brjod la/ /bdag ni gzugs las de nyid gzhan med phyir/ /gzugs bdag ma yin bdag ni gzugs ldan min/ /gzugs la bdag med bdag la'ang gzugs yod min/ /de ltar rnam bzhir phung kun shes bya ste/ /de dag bdag
237b7(mdo 'grel): tu lta ba nyi shur 'dod/ /bdag med rtogs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis/ /bcom pa'i bdag dang lhan cig 'jig 'gyur ba/ /'jig tshogs ltar? bstan pa la gnas pa'i/ /rtse mo mtho bar gyur pa 'di dag go/ /kha cig gang zag rdzas yod de nyid gzhan
238a1(mdo 'grel): rtag dang mi rtag brjod du med 'dod de/ /rnam shes drug gi shes byar de 'dod cing/ /de ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhir yang 'dod/ /gang phyir dngos yod brjod med ma yin pas/ /gzugs las sems brjod med par
238a2(mdo 'grel): mi rtogs pa/ /de bzhin bdag 'ga' dngos por grub gyur na/ /sems ltar brjod du med pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar bum pa'i dngos po gzugs sogs las/ /brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin med 'gyur bzhin/ /bdag gang phung po las
238a3(mdo 'grel): brjod med 'gyur te/ ngo bo nyid kyis yod par rtogs mi 'gyur/ /rnam shes dngos yod rang las gzhan min dang/ gzugs sogs rnams las gzhan du gyur 'dod cing/ /dngos la rnam pa de gnyis mthong gyur pa/ /bdag ni med de
238a4(mdo 'grel): dngos chos dang bral phyir/ /de phyir ngar 'dzin brten ni dngos po min/ /phung las gzhan min phung po'i ngo bo min/ /phung po'i rten min 'di ni de ldan min/ /'di ni phung rnams brten nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /shing rta rang gi yan lag las gzhan
238a5(mdo 'grel): min/ /gzhan min ma yin de ldan yang min zhing/ /yan lag la yin yan lag dag der min/ /'dus pa tsam min dbyibs min sngar bzhin no/ /gal te tshogs tsam shing ltar 'gyur na ni/ /sil bur gnas la shing rta nyid yod 'gyur//
238a6(mdo 'grel): gang phyir yan lag can med yan lag dag /med pas tshogs tsam shing rtar rigs pa'ang min/ /gal te yan lag gi dbyibs sngar yod pa/ ji bzhin shing rtar gtogs la'ang de bzhin na/ /de dag dbye bar gyur la ji lta bar/ /da
238a7(mdo 'grel): lta yang ni shing rta yod na ni 'gyur/ /gal te shing rta'i dus na yan lag la/ /sngar las dbyibs kyi khyad par gzhan yod na/ /gzung yod 'gyur na yod min de yi phyir/ /yan lag gi dbyibs shing rta nyid ma yin/ /gang phyir khyod kyi tshogs
238b1(mdo 'grel): pa can med pa/ /dbyibs de yan lag tshogs kyi ma yin na/ /gang zhig ci yang ma yin de brten nas/ /'dir ni dbyibs su lta zhig ji ltar 'gyur/ /khyod kyis 'di ni ji ltar 'dod de ltar/ /mi bden pa yi rgyu la brten byas nas/ /'bras bu'i rnam pa mi
238b2(mdo 'grel): bden rang bzhin can/ /thams cad kyang ni skye bar shes par gyis/ /'dis ni gzugs sogs de ltar gnas rnams la/ /bum blo zhes bya 'ang rigs ba'ang ma yin nyid/ /skye ba med pas gzugs sogs kyang yod min/ /de yi phyir yang de dag
238b3(mdo 'grel): dbyibs mi rigs/ /de ni dam pa'i don dang kun rdzob tu/ /rnam pa bdun gyis grub 'gyur min mod kyi/ /nam dbyad med par 'jig rten nyid las 'di/ /rang gi yan lag brten nas 'dogs pa yin/ /shing rta nyid ni yan lag can nyid dang/ /cha shas
238b4(mdo 'grel): can dang byed pa po nyid dang/ /len pa nyid duAng 'jig rten la grub pas/ /'jig rten grags pa'i kun rdzob dgag mi bya/ rnam bdun gyis med gang de ji lta bur/ /yod ces rnal 'byor pas 'di yod mi rnyed/ /des de nyid la'ang bde blag 'jug 'gyur
238b5(mdo 'grel): bas/ 'dir de'i grub pa'ang de bzhin 'dod par byed/ /shing rta med na de tshe yan lag can/ /med pas de yi yan lag kyang yod min/ /blo mes yan lag can bsregs yan lag ni/ /shing rta chig pa'i yan lag bzhin du med/ /de bzhin 'jig rten grags
238b6(mdo 'grel): pas phung po dang/ /khams dad de bzhin skye mched drug brten nas/ /bdag kyang nye bar len po nyid du 'dod/ /nyer len las yin 'di ni byed po'ang yin/ /dngos yod min phyir 'di ni brtan min zhing/ /mi brtan nyid min 'di ni skye 'jig min/ /'di
238b7(mdo 'grel): la rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yang/ /yod min de nyid dang ni gzhan nyid min/ /gang la rtag tu 'gro rnams dang 'dzin blo/ /rab tu 'byung zhing de yi gang yin der/ /da yir 'dzin blo 'byung ba bdag de ni/ /ma rtags grags par gti mug las
239a1(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /gang phyir byed po med can las med pa/ /de phyir bdag nyid med par bdag gir med/ /de phyir bdag dang bdag gi stong lta bas/ /rnal 'byor ba de rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /bum snam re lde dmag dang phreng
239a2(mdo 'grel): ba nags tshal dang/ /shing rta bran dang khang khyim la sogs dngos po rnams/ /gang gi sgo nas 'gro 'dis bsnyad bzhin rtogs bya ste/ /thub dbang de ni 'jig rten rtsod pa mi mdzad phyir/ /yon tan yan lag 'dod chags mtshan nyid
239a3(mdo 'grel): shing sogs dang/ yon tan can lus chags dang mtshan gzhi la sogs dag /shing rta'i dpyad pas rnam pa bdun du yod min zhing/ de las gzhan du 'jig rten grags par yod pa yin/ /gal te rgyu yis bskyed bya bskyed pas na de
239a4(mdo 'grel): rgyu yin la/ /gal te 'bras mi bskyed na de rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur zhing/ /'bras bu yang ni rgyu yod gyur na skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /gang las gang zhig 'gyur ba gang zhig las sngar gang 'gyur smros/ /gal te khyod kyi rgyu yis phrad nas
239a5(mdo 'grel): rgyu yin la/ /gal te 'bras mi bskyed na de rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur zhing/ /'bras bu yang ni rgyu yod gyur na skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /gang las gang zhig 'gyur ba gang zhig las sngar gang 'gyur smros/ /gal te khyod kyi rgyu yis phrad nas
239a6(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu skye dbyed na/ /nus pa gcig pas rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad med 'gyur zhing/ /ma phrad na ni rgyu dang rgyu min khyad par med 'gyur la/ /gnyis po spangs nas rtog pa gzhan yang yod par 'gyur ma yin/ /ci ste rgyu yis 'bras mi
239a7(mdo 'grel): bskyed na 'bras med pas/ /'bras bral rgyu ni rgyu med can 'gyur 'dod pa'ang min/ /gang phyir 'di gnyis sgyu ma dang 'dra de yi phyir/ /bdag la skyon med 'jig rten dngos po rnams kyang yod/ /sun 'byin 'dis ni sun dbyung phrad nas sun
239a8(mdo 'grel): 'byin nam/ /ma phrad 'byin zhes skyon 'di khyod la'ang 'gyur min nam/ /gnyis po spangs nas rtog pa gzhan yang yod ma yin/ /de skad smro zhing rang phyogs kho na rnam 'joms pa/ /de tshe khyod kyis sun dbyung sun 'byin nus ma yin//
239b1(mdo 'grel): rang gi tshig la'ang thal ba mtshungs pa'i ltag chod kyis/ /rigs pa med par dngos po kun la skur 'debs phyir/ /khyod ni skye bo dam pas bzhed par mi 'gyur zhing/ rang phyogs med pas sun mi phyin du rgol ba'ang yin/ /sun 'byin pa yis sun
239b2(mdo 'grel): dbyung phrad dang ma phrad par/ /sun 'byin byed ces smras pa'i nyes pa 'di gang la/ /nges par phyogs yod de la 'gyur gyi bdag la phyogs/ /yod pa min pas thal bar 'gyur ba srid ma yin/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yod khyad par rnams
239b3(mdo 'grel): gzugs brnyan la yang mthong 'gyur de tshe nyi ma dang/ /phrad dang ma phrad 'thad pa med par gzugs brnyan ni/ /tha snyad tsam du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin/ /der ni med kyang rang gi byad bzhin mdzes pa dag/ sgrub bar byed ba 'di
239b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'dir yang shes rab gdong/ /sbyang bar bya la nus par mthong ba'i gtan tshigs ni/ /mi bden pas kyang bsgrub bya rtogs par shes par bya/ /gal te rang gi go byed gtan tshigs dngos nyid dang/ dngos su go bya bsgrub bya'i ngo bo'ang
239b5(mdo 'grel): yod 'gyur na/ /phrad ba la sogs rigs pa nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur zhig na/ /de ni med pas khyod kyi yi chad 'ba' zhig yin/ /dngos rnams rang bzhin med par rtogs su gzhug par ni/ /bla ba de ltar rang bzhin yod par gzhan dag la/ /bde
239b6(mdo 'grel): blag nyid du sgrub par nus pa ma yin na/ /ci phyir rtogs ge ngan pas 'jig rten 'dir bcol byed/ /sun 'byin lhag ma gong du bstan pa'ang shes byas nas/ /phrad pa'i rtag pa la sogs lan du 'di brjod bya/ /sun ci phyin du rgol ba'ang ji ltar
239b7(mdo 'grel): yod min zhes/ /sngar bshad lhag ma phyogs 'di nyid kyis rtogs par bya/ /bdag med 'di ni 'gro ba rnam dgrol phyir/ /chos dang gang zag dbye bas rnam gnyis gsungs/ /de ltar ston pas slar yang 'di nyid ni/ /gdul bya rnams
240a1(mdo 'grel): la phye ste rnam med gsungs/ /spros dang bcas par stong pa nyid/ /bcu drug bshad nas mdor bsdus te/ /slar yang bzhir bshad de dag ni/ /theg chen du yang bzhed pa yin/ /gang phyir de yi rang bzhin ni/ /yin phyir
240a2(mdo 'grel): mig ni mig gis stong/ /de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus dang yid kyang bsnyad par bya/ /thar thug gnas pa ma yin dang/ /'jig pa ma yin nyid kyi phyir/ mig la sogs pa drug po yi/ /rang bzhin med nyid gang yin pa/ /de ni nang stong nyid du
240a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/ /yin phyir gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong/ /sgra dang dri ro reg bya dang/ /chos rnams nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /gzugs sogs rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /phyi rol stong pa nyid du 'dod/ /gnyis ka rang
240a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin med pa ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yin no/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /mkhas pas stong pa nyid ces pa snyad/ /ngo bos stong par 'dod pa yin/ /stong nyid stong nyid du 'dod de/ stong nyid dngos po'i blo can gyis/ /'dzin pa
240a5(mdo 'grel): bzlog phyir gsungs pa yin/ /sems can snod kyi 'jig rten ni/ /ma lus khyab byed nyid phyir dang/ /tshad med dpe yi mu mdza' ni/ /med phyir phyogs rnams chen po nyid// 'di dag bcu car phyogs rnams kyis/ /stong pa nyid de gang
240a6(mdo 'grel): yin pa/ /chen po stong pa nyid yin te/ /chen por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir gsungs/ /'di ni dgos pa mchog yin pa/ /don dam mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /de ni de yis stong nyid gang/ /de ni don dam stong pa nyid/ /mya ngan 'das dngos blo can gyi
240a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir/ /don dam mkhyen pas don dam pa/ /stong pa nyid ni bstan pa mdzad/ /rkyen las byung phyir khams gsum po/ /'dus byas byin par nges par bsnyad/ /de nyid de yis stong nyid gang/ /de ni 'dus byas
240b1(mdo 'grel): stong nyid bsnyad/ /gang la skye gnas 'jig med pa/ /de ni 'dus ma byas shes bya/ /de yi stong nyid gang yin pa/ /de ni 'dus ma byas stong nyid/ /gang la mdza' ni yod min pa/ /de ni mdza' las 'das par brjod/ /de yi stong nyid gang yin pa/ /de ni
240b2(mdo 'grel): mdza' las 'das stong nyid/ /thog ma dang po tha ma mdza' / /de dag med phyir 'khor ba ni/ /thog ma tha ma med par brjod/ /'gro 'ong bral phyir rmi lam lta'i/ /srid 'di de yis dben nyid gang/ /de ni thog ma dang tha ma/ /med pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes
240b3(mdo 'grel): bstan bcos las ni nges par bsnyad/ /dor ba zhes bya 'thor ba dang/ /khor ba la ni nges par brjod/ /dor med stong pa med pa ste/ /'ga' yang bor med gang yin pa'o/ /dor ba med pa de nyis kyis/ /de nyid stong pa gang yin pa/ /de yi phyir na dor
240b4(mdo 'grel): med pa/ /stong pa nyid ces bya bar brjod/ /'dus byas la sogs ngo bo nyid/ /gang phyir slob ma rang sangs rgyas/ /rgyal sras de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /ma mdzad de phyir 'dus byas la/ /sogs pa rnams kyis ngo bo nyid/ /rang
240b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin nyid du bsnyad pa ste/ de nyid de yis stong nyid gang/ /de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /khams bco brgyad dang reg drug dang/ /de las byung pa'i tshor drug dang/ /gzugs can gzugs can min de bzhin/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas
240b6(mdo 'grel): chos rnams/ /chos de dag ni thams cad kyis/ /de dag gis dben nyid nyid gang/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos med gang/ /de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/ /gzugs ni gzugs rung mtshan nyid can/ /tshor ba myong ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /'du shes
240b7(mdo 'grel): mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/ /'du byed mngon bar 'du byed pa'o/ /yul la so sor rnam rig pa pa/ /rnam shes rang gi mtshan nyid do/ /phung po sdug bsngal rang mtshan nyid/ /khams kyi bdag nyid sbrul gdug 'dod/ /skye mched rnams kyi sangs
241a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyis/ /skye pa'i sgor gyur nyid du gsungs/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang/ /de ni 'du 'phro mtshan nyid do/ /gtong ba sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /tshul khrims gdung med mtshan nyid bzod/ /khro med mtshan nyid brtson
241a2(mdo 'grel): 'grus kyi/ /kha na ma tho med nyid do/ /bsam gtan sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /shes rab chags med mtshan nyid de/ /mya ngan 'das par 'gro phyir ro/ /'ga' la'ang chags pa med phyir ro/ /pha rol phyin pa drug rnams kyi/ /mtshan nyid 'di
241a3(mdo 'grel): dag yin par brjod/ /bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang/ de bzhin gzhan gang gzugs med pa/ /de dag yang dag mkhyen pa yis/ /mi 'khrugs mtshan nyid can du gsungs/ /byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun/ /nges par
241a4(mdo 'grel): 'byung byed rang mtshan nyid/ /stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'di/ /dmigs pa med pas rnam dben nyid/ /mtshan ma med pa'i zhi nyid te/ /gsum pa'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal dang/ /gti mug med pa'o rnam thar gyi/ /mtshan nyid rnam par
241a5(mdo 'grel): grol byed pa'o/ /stobs zhes bya ba shin tu ni/ /rnam par nges pa'i rang bzhin gsungs/ /skyob pa'i mi 'jigs ba rnams ni/ /shin tu brtan pa'i ngo bo yin/ /so so yang dag rig rnams ni/ /spobs sogs chad med mtshan nyid can/ /'gro
241a6(mdo 'grel): la phan pa nyer sgrub pa/ /byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /sdug bsngal can rnams yongs skyob pa/ /thugs rje chen po'o dga' pa ni/ /rab dga' mtshan nyid btang snyoms ni/ /ma 'dres mtshan nyid yin zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa//
241a7(mdo 'grel): bcu dang brgyad du gang 'dod dag /gang phyir ston des mi 'phrogs pa/ /de phyir mi phrogs rang mtshan nyid/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes ni/ /mngon sum mtshan nyid can du 'dod/ /gzhan ni nyi che ba nyid kyis/ /mngon sum zhes byar mi 'dod do//
241b1(mdo 'grel): gang zhig 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang/ /'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid gang/ /de de kho nas stong pa nyid/ /de ni rang mtshan stong nyid brjod/ /da ltar ba 'di mi gnas shing/ /'das dang ma 'ongs yod ma yin/ /gang du de dag mi dmigs pa/ /de la mi dmigs pa zhes brjod
241b2(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs pa de rang ngo bo/ /de yi dben pa nyid gang de/ /ther zug gnas dang 'jig min pas/ /mi dmigs zhes bya'i stong nyid do/ /rkyen las byung phyir dngos rnams las/ /'dus pa pa yi ngo bo med/ /'dus pa pa ni de nyid kyis/ /stong nyid dngos
241b3(mdo 'grel): med de nyid do/ /dngos po'i sgras ni mdor bsdu na/ /phung po lnga rnams brjod pa yin/ /de rnams de yis stong nyid gang/ /de dngos stong pa nyid du bshad/ /mdor na dngos po med pa ni/ /'dus ma byas chos rnams la brjod/ /de nyid dngos med
241b4(mdo 'grel): de stong nyid/ /dngos po med pa'ang stong nyid do/ /rang bzhin ngo bo med nyid ni/ /rang bzhin zhes bya'i stong nyid do/ /'di ltar rang bzhin ma byas pas/ /rang bzhin zhes ni bya bar bsnyad/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba 'am/ /ma byung rung ste dngos
241b5(mdo 'grel): su na/ /dngos po kun gyi stong pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi dngos por rab tu bsgrags/ /yang dag mdza' dang de bzhin nyid/ /gang de gzhan dngos stong nyid do/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gzhung las/ /de dag de skad rab tu bsgrags/ /de phyir blo gros zer gyis
241b6(mdo 'grel): snang ba gsal byas pa/ /rang gi lag na gnas pa'i skyu ru ra bzhin du/ /srid gsum 'di dag gdod nas skye med par/ /rtogs te tha snyad bden pa'i stobs kyis 'gog par 'gro/ /rtag tu 'gog par rtogs pa'i bsam ldan yin mod kyi//
241b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba mgon med pa la snying rje'ang skyed par byed/ /bde gshegs gsung skye ba sangs rgyas 'bring bcas ma lus kun/ /gong du 'gro ba'i blo yis pham par byed pa'ang yin/ /kun rdzob don dam gshog yangs dkar po rgyas gyur pa/ /dad pa'i
242a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po de ni skye bo'i dad pa yis/ /mdun du brdar nas dge ba'i rlung gi shugs stobs kyis/ /rgyal pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol mchog tu 'gro /dbu ma la 'jug pa las mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems
242a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' i sems bskyed pa drug pa'o// //ring du song ba 'dir ni skad cig dang/ skad cig la ni 'gog par 'jug gyur zhing/ /thabs kyi pha rol phyin legs 'bar pa 'thob/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las ring du song ba zhes bya ba byang
242a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa bdun pa'o// //yang yang sngar dge las lhag thob bya'i phyir/ /gang du phyir mi ldog pa nyid 'gyur ba/ /mi g.yo de la bdag nyid che de 'jug /de yi smon lam rnam par dag 'gyur zhing//
242a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba rnams kyi 'gog las slong par mdzad/ /chags pa med pa'i blo ni skyon rnams dag dang lhan cig mi gnas phyir/ /sa brgyad pa la dri ma de dag rtsar bcas nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing/ /nyon mongs zad cing khams gsum bla mar
242a5(mdo 'grel): gyur kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /'byor pa mkha' ltar mdza' bral ma lus thob par nus ma yin/ /'khor ba 'gags kyang dbang rnams bcu po thob par gyur zhing de dag gis/ /srid pa'i 'gro bar rang gi bdag nyid sna tshogs
242a6(mdo 'grel): ston par byed par 'gyur/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'o// //dgu pa la ni de'i stobs lta zhig mdza' dag rdzogs par dag 'gyur zhing/
242a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin yang dag rig chos rang gi yon tan yongs su dag pa'ang 'thob/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa dgu pa'o// //bcu pa'i sa la de yis
242b1(mdo 'grel): kun nas sangs rgyas rnams las dbang bskur bas/ /dam pa 'thob cing ye shes lhag par mchog tu byung bar gyur ba'ang yin/ /char sprin rnams las chu char 'bab pa ji ltar de bzhin 'gro rnams kyi/ /dge ba'i lo thog ched du rgyal
242b2(mdo 'grel): sras las kyang lhun grub chos char 'bab/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa bcu pa'o// //de tshe 'dis ni sangs rgyas brgya mthong zhing/ /de dag byin gyis brlabs kyang
242b3(mdo 'grel): 'di yis thob/ de nyid tshe na bskal pa brgyar gnas shing/ /de snyed sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar yang 'jug /ting 'dzin brgya la 'jug cing ldang byed de/ 'jig rten khams brgya g.yo zhing snang bar nus/ /de bzhin sems can brgya phrag
242b4(mdo 'grel): smin byed cing/ /brgya phrag zhing dag tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /der ni rang gi lus brgya ston byed cing/ /mdzes pa'i lus re la yang rang gi 'khor/ /rgyal ba'i sras po brgya phrag ldan par ston/ /blo ldan rab dga' la gnas yon tan 'di dag
242b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /de bzhin dri med thob par gyur pa'i yon tan yang/ /de dag stong ni thob par 'gyur te sa lnga po/ /'di dag la gnas rim pa bzhin du 'bum phrag thob/ /bye ba brgya 'thob bye ba stong phrag thob par 'gyur/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong 'gyur
242b6(mdo 'grel): thob cing bye ba phrag /khrag khrig phrag brgyar gyur pa de nyid stong phrag tu/ /yongs su bsgyur ba de ni mdza' dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /mi g.yo'i sar gnas rnam rtog med pa des/ /stong gsum brgya phrag stong bsdoms 'jig rten na/
242b7(mdo 'grel): rdul tshad ji snyed yod pa de rnams dang/ /grangs mnyam yon tan dag ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /legs pa'i blo gros sa la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpas sngar bstan yon tan dag /grangs med brgya phrag stong du yang
243a1(mdo 'grel): dag par/ /bsdoms pa phrag bcu'i rdul tshad thob par 'gyur/ /re zhig bcu pa 'dir de'i yon tan dag /ngag gi spyod yul las ches 'das gyur zhing/ /ngag gi spyod yul ma yin bsdoms rnams na/ rdul dag
243a2(mdo 'grel): ji snyed yod pa de snyed 'thob/ /grangs med brgya phrag stong du yang dag par/ /ba spu'i khung bur byang chub sems rnams dang/ /lhan cig rdzogs sangs rgyas sku grangs med dang/ /de bzhin lha dang lha min mi dag kyang/ /skad cig skad cig
243a3(mdo 'grel): la ni ston par nus/ /ji ltar dri med mkha' la zla snang gsal ba ltar/ /sngon tshe stobs bcu bskyed pa'i sa la khyod kyis slar yang 'bad gyur cing/ /'og min du ni gang gi don du 'bad gyur go 'phang mchog zhi ba/ /yon tan kun gyi
243a4(mdo 'grel): mthar thug mtshungs pa med de khyod kyis brnyes/ /ji ltar snod kyi dbye bas mkha' la dbye ba med de ltar/ /dngos byas dbye ba 'ga' yang de nyid la med de yi phyir/ /ro gcig nyid du yang dag thugs su chud par mdzad gyur nas//
243a5(mdo 'grel): mkhyen bzang khyod kyis skad cig gis ni shes bya thugs su chud/ /gang tshe zhi ba de nyid yin na de la blo gros 'jug mi 'gyur/ /blo ma zhugs par shes bya'i yul can nges par rigs pa'ang ma yin la/ /kun nas shes med pa ni shes
243a6(mdo 'grel): par ji ltar 'gyur te 'gal bar 'gyur/ /mkhyen po med par khyod kyi gzhan la 'di lta'o zhes su zhig ston/ /gang tshe skye med de nyid yin zhing blo yang skye ba dang bral ba/ /de tshe de yis de rnams brten las de nyid rtogs par brjod bya
243a7(mdo 'grel): ste/ /ji ltar sems ni gang gi rnam pa can du gyur ba de yis yul/ /de yongs shes pa de bzhin tha snyad nye bar bsten nas rigs pa yin/ /de yi longs spyod rdzogs sku bsod nams kyi/ /zin dang sprul pa la gzhan las de'i
243b1(mdo 'grel): mthus/ /sgra gang chos kyi de nyid ston 'byung ba/ /de las 'jig rten gyis kyang de nyid rig /'di ltar rdza mkhan stobs dang ldan pa yis/ /yun rings 'bad pa ches bskor 'khor lo de/ de'i rtsol da ltar skyes pa med bzhin duAng/ /'khor
243b2(mdo 'grel): zhing bum pa la sogs rgyur mthong ltar/ /de bzhin da lta skyed stsol med bzhin du/ /chos kyi bdag can sku nyid la bzhugs de'i/ /'jug pa gdul bya'i dge dang smon lam gyi/ /khyad par gyis 'phangs las ches bsam mi khyab/ /shes
243b3(mdo 'grel): bya'i bud shing skam po ma lus pa/ /bsregs pas zhi de rgyal rnams chos sku ste/ /de tshe skye ba med cing 'gag pa'ang med/ /sems 'gags pa de sku yis mngon sum mdzad/ /zhi sku dpag bsam shing ltar gsal gyur zhing/ /yid bzhin nor bu
243b4(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin rnam mi rtogs/ /'gro grol bar du 'jig rten 'byor slad rtag /'di ni spros dang bral la snang bar 'gyur/ /thub dbang dus gcig kho nar de'i rgyu mthun/ /gzugs sku gcig la rang gi skye gnas skabs/ /sngar 'gag gsal dang
243b5(mdo 'grel): ma 'chol byung tshul ni/ /ma lus kyis bkra mdza' dag ston par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ci 'drar sangs rgyas dang/ /de dag sku spyod mthu stobs ci 'dra dang/ /nyan thos dge 'dun ji snyed ci 'dra dang/ /byang chub sems rnams der
243b6(mdo 'grel): gzugs ji 'dra dang/ /ci 'dra'i chos dang der bdag ci 'dra ba/ /chos thos spyod pa gang la spyad pa dang/ /sbyin gang ji tsam de dag la phul ba/ /de dag ma lus sku gcig la ston mdzad/ /de bzhin tshul khrims bzod brtson ting
243b7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang/ shes rab spyod tshe sngar gyi gnas skabs gang/ /ma tshang med dang nyid kyi spyod pa kun/ /sku yi ba spu khung bur gsal bar ston/ /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang 'byung 'gyur dang/ /gang dag de ltar 'jig rten khams
244a1(mdo 'grel): kun na/ /tshig gsang mthon pos chos ston sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzir ba'i 'gro dbugs 'byin mdzad bzhugs pa dang/ /dang po thugs bskyed byang chub snying po bar/ /de dag skyong kun dngos rnams mi 'phrul gyi//
244a2(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin mkhyen nas bdag bzhin ba spu yi/ /khung bur dus gcig la ni gsal bar ston/ /de bzhin dus gsum 'phags pa rgyal sras dang/ /rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos ma lus kyi/ /spyod dang de dag skye bo'i gnas skabs
244a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /thams cad ba spu'i khung bur dus gcig ston/ /dag pa 'di ni bzhed par 'jug pa yis/ /rdul gcig yul la mkhas gtugs 'jig rten dang/ /'jig rten mdza' yas phyogs khyab rdul ston mod/ /rdul rags mi 'gyur 'jig rten phra mi
244a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rnam rtog mi mnga' khyod kyis srid mdza' i bar/ /skad cig re la ston mdzad spyad pa yi/ /rnam pa sna tshogs de snyed 'dzam gling gi /ma lus rdul gyi grangs la yod ma yin/ /gnas dang gnas min mkhyen stobs dang/ /de bzhin las rnams
244a5(mdo 'grel): smin mkhyen dang/ /mos pa sna tshogs thugs chung dang/ /sna tshogs khams ni mkhyen stobs dang/ /dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin/ /mkhyen dang kun 'gro mkhyen pa dang/ /bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin dang/ /snyoms par 'jug sogs
244a6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen stobs dang/ /sngon nas dran pa mkhyen pa dang/ de bzhin 'chi 'pho skye mkhyen dang/ /zag pa rnams zad mkhyen stobs te/ /stobs ni bcu po 'di dag go /rgyu gzhan zhig las gang zhig nges par skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni de yi gnas su de mkhyen
244a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis gsungs/ /bshad pa las bzlog gnas min shes bya mdza' yas dang/ mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa de ni stobs su bshad/ /'dod dang mi 'dod de la bzlog dang zad dngos kyis/ /las dang de yi rnam smin shin tu sna tshogs
244b1(mdo 'grel): la'ang/ /bshad pa las bzlog gnas min shes bya mdza' yas pa/ /mkhyen pa nus mthu thogs med so sor 'jug gyur pa/ /dus gsum shes bya khyab mdzad de ni stobs su 'dod/ /'dod chags sogs kyi 'byung ba'i stobs kyis 'dod pa
244b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /shin tu sna tshogs dman dang 'bring dang khyad 'phags dag /de las gzhan rnams kyis bsgribs mos pa'ang mkhyen pa ni/ /dus gsum 'gro ba ma lus khyab pa stobs zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas khams kyi rnam par dbye la mkhas
244b3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis/ /mig sogs dag gi rang bzhin gang de khams su gsungs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen pa mdza' yas shing/ /rnam kun khams kyi khyad par la 'jug stobs su 'dod/ /kun tu rtog sogs chos rno
244b4(mdo 'grel): nyid ni mchog nyid dang/ /'bring dang brtul pa'i gnas skabs mchog min brjod pa dang/ /mig la sogs dang phan tshun sgrub nus chub pa la/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa chags med stobs su 'dod/ /lan 'ga' rgyal ba nyid dang
244b5(mdo 'grel): 'ga' zhig rang rgyal gyi/ /byang chub dang ni nyan thos lha mi dang/ /yi dwags dud 'gro dmyal sogs rnams 'gro ba/ /de la mkhyen pa chags med mdza' yas stobs su 'dod/ /'jig rten mdza' yas rnal 'byor bye brag tha dad pa/ /bsam
244b6(mdo 'grel): gtan rnam thar brgyad dang zhi gnas gang dag dang/ /snyoms 'jug khyad par gang dag gcig dang brgyad gyur pa/ /de la mkhyen pa thogs med 'di ni stobs su bshad/ /gti mug de srid srid nas 'das pa'i dus dang ni/ /sems
244b7(mdo 'grel): can gzhan re'i srid par sems can ji snyed pa/ /de snyed mdza' yas bzhi dang bcas shing yul phyogs dang/ /rnam pa dang bcas mkhyen pa gang yin stobs su bshad/ /sems can rnams kyi sems can re re'i 'chi 'pho dang/ /skye
245a1(mdo 'grel): gang 'jig rten la gnas nam mkha' i mthar thug dang/ /bkra mang de la mkhyen pa dus der 'jug pa yis/ /ma chags rnams kun yongs dag mdza' yas stobs su 'dod/ /rnam kun mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis myur du
245a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal rnams kyis/ /nyon mongs dag ni bag chags dang bcas 'jig 'gyur dang/ /slob ma la sogs nyon mongs blo yis 'gog pa dang/ /de la mkhyen pa chags med mdza' yas stobs su 'dod/ /nam mkha' i med pas 'dab chags ldog par mi
245a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur gyi/ /'dir ni rang mthu zad pas ldog par 'gyur de bzhin/ /slob ma dang bcas sangs rgyas sras rnams sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan mkha' ltar brjod mi nus pas ldog par 'gyur/ /de phyir khyod kyi yon tan bdag 'dra bas/ /shes
245a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang ni brjod par nus min yang/ /'on kyang de dag 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis/ /bshad phyir dogs spangs cung zad tsam cig smras/ /zab mo stong pa nyid yin te/ /yon tan gzhan rnams rgya che ba'o/ /zab dang rgya che'i tshul shes pas/ /yon tan 'di
245a5(mdo 'grel): dag thob par 'gyur/ /khyod ni srid gsum brgal te mi g.yo'i sku las slar yang sprul pa yis/ /gshegs pa dang ni bltams dang byang chub zhi ba'i 'khor lo'ang ston par mdzad/ /de ltar khyod kyi 'jig rten g.yo bag spyod can re ba'i
245a6(mdo 'grel): zhags pa ni/ /mang pos bcings pa ma lus thugs rjes mya ngan 'das par bkri bar mdzad/ /gang phyir 'di na de nyid shes las dri ma mdza' dag sel ba ni/ /lhur len gzhan med chos rnams de nyid rnam 'gyur dbye la'ang rten min
245a7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /de nyid yul can blo gros 'di yang tha dad 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ /de yi phyir na khyod kyis 'gro la theg pa mi mnyam dbyer med bstan/ gang phyir 'gro la nyes pa skyed byed snyigs ma 'di dag yod gyur ba/ /de phyir 'jig rten
245b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas spyod yul gting zab la 'jug mi 'gyur zhing/ /bde gshegs kyang phyir khyod la mkhyen rabs thugs rje thabs dang lhan cig pa/ /mnga' dang gang phyir bdag gis sems can dgrol zhes khyod kyis zhal bzhes pa/ /de phyir mkhas
245b2(mdo 'grel): pas rin po che yi gling du chags pa'i 'gro sogs kyi/ /dal ba nyer sel grong khyer yid 'ong bar du rnam par bkod pa ltar/ /khyod kyi theg pa 'di ni slob ma nye bar zhi ba'i tshul la yid/ /sbyar ba mdzad cing rnam par dben la blo sbyangs rnams la logs
245b3(mdo 'grel): su gsungs/ /sangs rgyas yul gyur phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus na/ /rdul phran ji snyed yod pa de snyed bde gshegs ni/ /byang chub mchog tu gshegs pa'i skal pa de snyed de/ /khyad kyis gsang 'di bsnyad par bgyi ba ma lags so//
245b4(mdo 'grel): ji srid 'jig rten ma lus mchog tu zhi ba ma thob dang/ /ji srid nam mkha' i khams ni med par ma gyur de srid du/ /shes rab yum dang snying rje'i ma mas bskyed cing 'dzin byed pas/ /rgyal ba khyod la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba gang la mnga' / /gti
245b5(mdo 'grel): mug skyon gyis 'jig rten kha zas dug bcas za ba yi/ /skye bo nyid kyi nang mi de la khyod brtse ji lta ba/ /de ltar dug zos nyen pa'i bu yi ma la sdug bsngal min/ /des na mgon po mchog tu rab zhir gshegs par 'gyur ma lags/ /gang gi
245b6(mdo 'grel): phyir na mi mkhas dngos dang dngos po med par zhen pa'i blo can gyis/ /skye dang 'jig gnas skabs dang sdug dang mi sdug bral phrad kyis bskyed sdug bsngal dang/ /sdig can 'gro ba thob pa de phyir thugs brtse'i yul du rab dong bas//
245b7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan thugs rjes khyod thugs zhi las bzlog pas khyod la mya ngan 'das mi mnga' / /lugs 'di dge slong zla grags kyis/ /dbu ma'i bstan bcos la btus nas/ /lung ji bzhin dang man ngag ni/ /ji lta ba bzhin brjod pa yin//
246a1(mdo 'grel): 'di las gzhan na lugs 'di ni/ /med pa de bzhin lugs 'di yang/ /gzhan la yod pa ma yin zhes/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ /klu sgrub blo mtsho shin tu rgya che'i kha dog gis 'jigs pas/ /skye bos lugs
246a2(mdo 'grel): bzang gang dag rgyang rings spangs pas de yi tshig /le'ur byas pa'i kha 'bus ku mu da kha phye ba'i chus/ /da ltar zla ba grags pa re rnams rab tu skod par byed/ /de nyid bshad zin zab mo 'jigs rung 'di ni sngon goms nyid las skye bo
246a3(mdo 'grel): yis/ /nges par rtogs 'gyur 'di ni gsan rgya che yang gzhan gyis khongs du chud mi 'gyur/ /de phyir tshul lugs rang blos sbyar ba de dag mthong nas bdag tu brjod pa yi/ /gzhung lugs rnams ltar gzhan lugs bzhed gzhung 'di las
246a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan la dga' blo dor bar bya/ /slob dpon klu sgrub lugs bzang bsnyad las bdag gis bsod nams phyogs kyi mthar/ /khyab cing yid mkha' nyon mongs kyis sngo ston ka'i rgyu skar ltar dkar ba 'am/ /sems kyi sprul la gdengs ka'i nor bu dang
246a5(mdo 'grel): 'dra gang zhing thob pa des/ /'jig rten ma lus de nyid rtogs nas myur du bde gshegs sar bgrod shog /dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ /slob dpon zla ba grags pa/ /zab pa dang/ rgya che ba'i tshul gsal bar byed pa/ theg pa
246a6(mdo 'grel): mchog la thugs gzhol bas/ /mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rabs dang thugs rje mnga' ba/ ri mor bris pa'i bdrus ma las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang/
246a7(mdo 'grel): bod kyi lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba las/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka ka la sha dang/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba ltar cung zad bcos pa/ /don tshang zhing tshig bde bar bris pa'o/ /yon
246b1(mdo 'grel): mchod bkra shis par gyur cig/ (//dbu ma 'jug pa bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ ma d+hya ma kA pa tA ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon
246b2(mdo 'grel): nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos sangs rgyas 'bring rnams thub dbang skyes/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs shing/ /snying rje'i sems dang gnyis su med blo dang/ /byang chub sems ni rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyu/ /gang
246b3(mdo 'grel): phyir brtse nyid rgyal ba'i lo thog phun tshogs 'di'i/ /sa bon dang ni spel la chu 'dra yun ring du/ /longs spyod gnas la smin pa lta bur 'dod gyur pa/ /de phyir bdag gis thog mar snying rje bstod par bgyi/ /dang por nga? zhes bdag la zhen gyur
246b4(mdo 'grel): cing/ /bdag gis 'di zhes dngos la chags bskyed pa/ /zo chun 'phyan ltar rang dbang med pa yi/ /'gro la snying rjer gyur gang de la 'dud/ /'gro ba g.yo ba'i chu yi nang gi zla ba ltar/ /g.yo dang rang bzhin nyid kyis stod par mthong ba yi/ /rgyal
246b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i sras po 'di yi sems gang 'gro ba rnams/ /rnam par grol bar bya phyir snying rje'i dbang gyur cing/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon pas rab bsngos dga' ba la/ /rab tu gnas pa de ni dang po zhes bya'o/ /de nas bzung ste de ni thob par gyur pa yis
246b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'i sgra nyid kyis bsnyad do/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs suAng skyes pa ste/ /'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum po thams cad spangs pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni dga' ba mchog tu gyur 'chad
246b7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /'jig rten khams brgya kun nas g.yo bar nus par gyur pa'ang yin/ /sa nas sar gnon byed cing gong ma rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de tshe 'di yid na 'gro'i lam rnams mdza' dag 'gag par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'di yi so so skye bo'i sa
247a1(mdo 'grel): rnams thams cad zad/ /'di ni 'phags pa brgyad pa ji lta de ltar nye bar bstan/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems lta dang po la gnas kyang/ /thub dbang gsung skyes dang bcas dang sangs rgyas rnams ni/ /bsod
247a2(mdo 'grel): nams dag gis dbang gis pham byas rnams par 'phel/ /de ni ring du song bar blo yang lhag par 'gyur/ /de tshe de la rdzogs sangs byang chub rgyu/ /dang po sbyin pa nyid ni lhag par 'gyur/ /rang sha ster la'ang gus par byas pa yis/ /snang du
247a3(mdo 'grel): mi rung dpog pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur/ /skye bo 'di kun bde ba mngon 'dod cing/ /mi rnams bde ba'ang longs spyod med min la/ /longs spyod kyang ni sbyin las 'byung mkhyen nas/ /thub pas dang por sbyin pa'i gtam mdzad do/ /snying rje dman zhing
247a4(mdo 'grel): shin tu rtsub sems can/ /rang don lhur len nyid du 'gyur ba gang/ /de dag gi yang 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams/ /sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i rgyur gyur sbyin las 'byung/ /'di yang sbyin pa'i skabs kyis nam zhig tshe/ /'phags pa'i skye bo
247a5(mdo 'grel): dang 'phrad myur du 'thob/ /de nas srid rgyun yang dag bcad byas te/ /de yi rgyu can zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'gro la phan par dam bcas yid can rnams/ /sbyin pas ring por mi thogs dga' ba 'thob/ /gang phyir brtse bdag brtse bdag
247a6(mdo 'grel): ma yin pa/ /de phyir sbyin pa'i gtam nyid gtso bo yin/ /ji ltar byin cig ces sgra thos bsams las/ /rgyal sras bde 'byung de ltar thub rnams la/ /zhi bar zhugs pas bde ba byed min na/ /thams cad btang bas lta zhig smos ci
247a7(mdo 'grel): dgos/ /lus bcad ster zhing bdag gi sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzhan dag rnams kyi dmyal ba la sogs pa'i/ /sdug bsngal rang rig nyid du mthong nas de/ /de bcad bya phyir myur du brtson 'grus rtsom/ /sbyin pa sbyin bya len po gtong
