247b1(mdo 'grel): pos stong/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i pha rol phyin zhes bya/ /gsum pa dag la chags skyes gyur pas de/ /'jig rten pa yi pha rol phyin ces bstan/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i sras kyi yid la rab gnas shing/ /dam pa'i rten la 'od chags mdzes pa
247b2(mdo 'grel): snyed gyur pa'i/ /dga' ba 'di ni nor bu chu shal ji bzhin du/ /mun pa stug po thams cad rnam par bsal nas rgyal/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa dang po'o// //de tshul phun tshogs yon tan dag ldan phyir/ /rmi lam
247b3(mdo 'grel): du yang 'tshul khrims dri ma spangs/ /lus ngag yid kyi rgyu ba dag gyur pas/ /dam pa'i las lam bcu char g.yog par byed/ /dge ba'i lam 'di lta zhig bcu char yang/ /de la klags te shin tu dag par 'gyur/ /ston ka'i rbA? ltar rtag
247b4(mdo 'grel): tu rnam dag de/ /zhi 'od chags par de dag gis rnam mdzes/ /gal te de ni khrims dag rang bzhin lta/ /de phyir de ni tshul khrims dag mi 'gyur/ /de phyir de ni rtag tu gsum char la'ang/ /gnyis bla'i rgyu ba yang dag bral bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pas
247b5(mdo 'grel): longs spyod dag ni 'gro ngan na'ang/ /skye bo tshul khrims rkang pa nyams la 'byung/ /skyed bcas dngos 'du yongs su zad pas na/ /phyin chad de la longs spyod 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe rang dbang 'jug cing mthun gnas pa/ /gal te 'di bdag
247b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzin phar mi byed na/ /g.yang sar lhung ba gzhan dbang 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de las phyi nas gang gis slong bar 'gyur/ /de phyir rgyal bas sbyin pa'i gtam mdzad nas/ /tshul khrims rjes 'gro'i gtam nyid mdzad pa yin/ /yon tan tshul khrims
247b7(mdo 'grel): zhing du rnam 'phel na/ /'bras bu nyer spyod chad pa med par 'gyur/ /so so'i skye bo rnams dang gsung skyes dang/ /rang byang chub la bdag nyid des rnams dang/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi nges par legs par dang/ /mngon mtho'i rgyu ni tshul
248a1(mdo 'grel): khrims las gzhan med/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho ro dang lhan cig dang/ /bkra shis rna nag ma dang lhan cig bzhin/ /de ltar tshul khrims dbang byas bdag nyid che/ /de 'chal ba dang lhan cig gnas mi 'dod/ /gang gis gang zhig gang
248a2(mdo 'grel): la spong byed pa/ /gsum du dmigs pa yod na tshul khrims de/ /'jig rten pa yi pha rol phyin zhes bshad/ /gsum pa chags pas stod de 'jig rten 'das/ /rgyal sras zla ba las byung srid min srid pa yi/ /dpal gyur dri ma dang bral dri ma med
248a3(mdo 'grel): 'di yang/ /ston ka'i dus kyi zla ba'i 'od ni ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i yid kyi gdung ba sel bar byed pa yin/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa gnyis pa'o// //shes bya'i bud shing ma lus sreg pa'i me'i/ /'od 'byung phyir na
248a4(mdo 'grel): sa ni gsum pa 'di/ /'od byed pa ste bde gshegs sras po la/ /de tshe nyi ltar zangs 'dra'i snang ba 'byung/ /gal te gnas min 'khrug pa 'ga' yis de'i/ /lus las shin rus bcas yun ring du/ /srang re re nas bcad par gyur kyang de'i/ /bzod
248a5(mdo 'grel): pa gcod par byed la lhag par skye/ /bdag med mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ /gang zhig gang gis gang tshe ji ltar gcod/ /gang phyir chos kun de yis gzugs bsnyan ltar/ /mthong ba des kyang de yis bzod par 'gyur/ /gnod pa
248a6(mdo 'grel): byas pas gal te der dkon na/ /de la bkon pas byas zin ldog gam ci/ /de phyir de'i bkon nges par 'dir don med/ /'jig rten pha rol yang ni 'gal bar 'gyur/ /sngon byas pa yi mi dge'i las kyi 'bras bu gang/ /zad par byed par
248a7(mdo 'grel): brjod par 'dod pa de nyid ko /gzhan la gnod pa dang ni khro bas sdug bsngal phyir/ /sa bon nyid du ji lta bur na khrid par byed/ /gang phyir rgyal sras rnams la khros pa yis/ /sbyin dang khrims byung dge ba bskal ba brgyar/ /bsags pa
248b1(mdo 'grel): skad cig gis 'joms de yi phyir/ /mi bzod las gzhan sdig pa yod ma yin/ /mi sdug gzugs su byed cing dam pa min pa bkri/ /tshul dang tshul min shes pa'i rnam dpyod 'phrog byed cing/ /mi bzod pa yis myur du ngan 'gror skyur bar
248b2(mdo 'grel): byed/ /bzod pas bshad zin dang 'gal yon tan rnams byed do/ /bzod pas mdzes shing skye bo dam pa la/ /phangs dang lugs dang lugs min shes pa la/ /mkhas par 'gyur zhing de yi 'og tu ni/ /lha mi'i skye dang sdig pa zad par
248b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /so so'i skye bo dang ni rgyal sras kyis/ /khro dang bzod pa'i skyon yon rig byas te/ /mi bzod spangs nas 'phags pa'i skye bo yis/ /bsngags pa'i bzod pa rtag tu myur bsten bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub phyir bsngos kyang//
248b4(mdo 'grel): gsum dmigs yod na de ni 'jig rten pa'o/ /dmigs pa med na de nyid sangs rgyas kyis/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i pha rol phyin ces bstan/ /sa der rgyal sras bsam gtan mngon shes dang/ /'dod chags zhe sdang yongs su zad par 'gyur//
248b5(mdo 'grel): des kyang rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi ni/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags 'joms par nus par 'gyur/ /sbyin sogs chos gsum de dag thal mo cher/ /bde bar gshegs pas khyim pa rnams la bsngags/ /bsod nams zhes bya'i tshogs kyang
248b6(mdo 'grel): de dag nyid/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi bdag nyid sku yi rgyu/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nyi ma la gnas 'od byed 'di/ /rang gtogs mun rnams dang po yang dag bsal byas nas/ /'gro ba'i mun pa rnam par 'joms par mngon par 'dod/ /sa
248b7(mdo 'grel): 'dir shin tu rno bar gyur kyang khro mi 'gyur/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ /sems bskyed pa gsum pa'o// //yon tan ma lus brtson 'grus rjes 'gro zhing/ /bsod nams blo gros tshogs ni gnyis kyi rgyu/ /brtson 'grus gang
249a1(mdo 'grel): du 'bar bar 'gyur pa yi/ /sa de bzhi po 'od ni 'gro ba'o/ /der ni bder gshegs sras la rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub phyogs lhag bsgom pa las skyes pa'i/ /snang ba zangs kyi 'od pas lhag 'byung zhing/ /rang du lta ba dang
249a2(mdo 'grel): 'grel yongs su zad/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o// //bdag nyid cha de bdud rnams kun gyis kyang/ /sbyang dka' i sa la pham par nus ma yin/ /bsam gtan lhag cing blo bzang bden rang bzhin/ /zhi ba
249a3(mdo 'grel): mo rtogs la'ang shin tu mkhas pa 'thob/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa lnga pa'o// //mngon du phyogs par mnyam bzhag sems gnas te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mngon phyogs shing/ /'di
249a4(mdo 'grel): brten 'byung ba'i de nyid mthong ba de/ /shes rab gnas pas 'gog pa thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar long ba'i tshogs kun ba bde blag tu/ /mig ldan skyes bu gcig gis 'dod pa yi/ /yul du khrid pa de bzhin 'dir yang blos/ /mig nyams
249a5(mdo 'grel): yon tan blangs te rgyal nyid 'gro/ /ji ltar de yis ches zab chos rtogs pa/ /lung dang gzhan yang rigs pas yin pas na/ /de ltar 'phags pa klu sgrub gzhung lugs las/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i lugs bzhin brjod par bya//
249a6(mdo 'grel): so so skye bo'i dus na'ang stong pa nyid thos nas/ /nang du rab tu dga' ba yang dang yang du 'byung/ /rab tu dga' ba las byung mchi mas mig brlan zhing/ /lus kyi ba spu ldang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa/ /de la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
249a7(mdo 'grel): blo yi sa bon yod/ /de nyid nye bar bstan pa'i snod ni de yin te/ /de la dam pa'i don gyi bden pa bstan par bya/ /de la de yi rjes su 'gro ba'i yon tan 'byung/ /rtag tu tshul khrims yang dag blangs nas gnas par 'gyur/ /sbyin pa
249b1(mdo 'grel): gtong bar 'gyur zhing snying rje bsten par byed/ /bzod pa sgom byed de yi dge ba byang chub tu/ /'gro ba dgrol bar bya phyir yongs su bsngo byed cing/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par byed/ /zab cing rgya che'i tshul la mkhas pa'i skye
249b2(mdo 'grel): bos ni/ /rim gyis rab tu dga' ba'i sa ni 'thob 'gyur bas/ /de ni don du gnyer ba lam 'di mnyan par gyis/ /de nyid de las 'byung min gzhan dag las ltag la zhig /gnyi ga las kyang ma yin rgyu med par ni ga la yod/ /de ni de las byung na yon
249b3(mdo 'grel): tan 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /skyes par gyur pa slar yang skye bar rigs pa'ang ma yin nyid/ /skyes zin slar yang skye bar yongs su rtog par 'gyur na ni/ /myu gu la sogs rnams kyi skye ba 'dir rnyed mi 'gyur zhing/ /sa bon srid mthar thug par
249b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu skye ba nyid du 'gyur/ /ji ltar de nyid kyis de rnam par 'jig par byed par 'gyur/ /byed rgyu sa bon gyi las tha dad myu gu'i dbyibs dang ni/ /kha dog ro nus smin pa'i tha dad khyod la med par 'gyur/ /gal te sngar gyi bdag gi dngos po bsal
249b5(mdo 'grel): nas de las gzhan/ /ngo bor 'gyur na de tshe de yi de nyid ji ltar 'gyur/ /gal te khyod kyi sa bon myu gu 'dir gzhan ma yin na/ /sa bon bzhin du myu gu zhes bya de gzung med pa 'am/ /yang na de dag gcig pas ji ltar myu gu 'di bzhin du/ /de
249b6(mdo 'grel): yang gzung du yod 'gyur de phyir 'di ni khas mi blang/ /gang phyir rgyu zhig na yang de yi 'bras bu mthong ba'i phyir/ /de nga gcig pa yin zhes 'jig rten gyis kyang khas mi len/ /de phyir dngos po bdag las 'byung zhes rab tu brtags pa
249b7(mdo 'grel): 'di/ /de nyid dang ni 'jig rten du yang rigs pa ma yin no/ /bdag las skye bar 'dod na bskyed par bya dang skyed byed dang/ /las dang byed pa po yang gcig nyid 'gyur na de dag ni/ /gcig nyid ma yin pas na bdag las skye bar khas blang
250a1(mdo 'grel): par/ /bya min rgya cher bshad pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur phyir ro/ /gzhan la brten nas gal te gzhan zhig 'byung bar 'gyur na ni/ /'o na me lce las kyang mun pa 'thug po 'byung 'gyur zhing/ thams cad las kyang
250a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad skye bar 'gyur te gang gi phyir/ /skyed par byed pa ma yin ma lus la yang gzhan nyid mtshungs/ /rab tu bya bar nus pa de phyir 'bras bur des brjod cing/ /gang zhig de bskyed nus pa de ni gzhan na'ang rgyu yin la/ /rgyud gcig  gtogs pa skyed par byed las skye ba de yi phyir/ /sa lu'i myu gu nas la sogs las de lta min zhe na/ /ji ltar nas dang ge sar dang ni keng shu ka la sogs/ /sa lu'i myu gu'i skyed par byed par 'dod min nus ldan min/ /rgyud gcig khongs
250a3(mdo 'grel): su gtogs min 'dra ba ma yin nyid de bzhin/ /sa lu'i sa bon yang ni de yi min te gzhan nyid phyir/ /myu gu sa bon dang ni dus mnyam yod pa ma yin te/ /gzhan nyid med par sa bon gzhan pa nyid du ga la 'gyur/ /nges na myu gu sa
250a4(mdo 'grel): bon las skye 'grub par 'gyur min pas/ /gzhan las skye ba yin zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di gtang bar byas/ /ji ltar srang gi mnga' gnyis mtho ba dang ni dma' ba dag/ dus mnyam ma yin par ni min par mthong ba de bzhin du/ /bskye
250a5(mdo 'grel): par bya dang skyed byed dag gi skye 'gag 'gyur zhe na/ /gal te gcig che yin na 'dis dus gcig med de yod min/ /gal te skye bzhin pa de skye la phyogs pa yod min zhing/ /'gag bzhin pa ni yod kyang 'jig la phyogs par
250a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod gyur pa/ /de tshe 'di ni ji lta bur na srang dang mtshungs pa yin/ /skye ba 'di ni byed po med par rigs pa'i ngo bo'ang min/ /gal te mig gi blo la rang gi skyed byed dus gcig pa/ /mig la sogs dang lhan cig 'byung ba 'du
250b1(mdo 'grel): shes la sogs las/ /gzhan nyid yod na yod la 'byung bas dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /ci ste de med ce na 'di la nyes pa bshad zin to/ /skyed par byed pa bskyed bya gzhan bskyed pa de rgyu yin na/ /yod pa 'am 'on te med dang gnyi ga gnyis
250b2(mdo 'grel): bral zhig bskyed grang/ /yod na skyed byed ci dgos med la'ang des ni ci zhig bya/ /gnyis nyid la des ci bya gnyis dang bral la'ang des ci bya/ /gang gis rang lta la gnas 'jig rten ched mar 'dod pas na/ /'dir ni rigs pa smras pa nyid kyis lta go
250b3(mdo 'grel): ci zhig bya/ /gzhan las gzhan 'byung ba yang 'jig rten pa yis rtogs 'gyur te/ /des na gzhan las skye yod 'dir ni rigs pa ci zhig dgos/ /dngos kun yang dag rdzun pa mthong ba yis/ /dngos rnyed ngo bo gnyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /yang
250b4(mdo 'grel): dag mthong yul gang de de nyid de/ /mthong ba rdzun pa kun rdzob bden par gsungs/ /mthong ba rdzun pa'ang rnam pa gnyis 'dod de/ /dbang po gsal dang dbang po skyon ldan no/ /skyon ldan dbang can rnams kyi shes pa ni/ /dbang po legs gyur shes
250b5(mdo 'grel): bltos log par 'dod/ /gnod pa med pa'i dbang po drug rnams kyis/ /gzung ba gang zhig 'jig rten gyis rtogs te/ /'jig rten nyid las bden yin lhag ma ni/ /'jig rten nyid las log par rnam par bzhag/ mi shes gnyid kyis
250b6(mdo 'grel): rab bskyed mu stegs can/ /rnams kyis bdag nyid ji bzhin brtags pa dang/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu sogs la brtags pa gang/ /de dag 'jig rten las kyang yang min nyid/ /mig ni rab rib can gyis dmigs pa yis/ /rab rib med shes la
250b7(mdo 'grel): gnod min ji ltar/ /de bzhin dri med ye shes spangs pa'i blos/ /dri med blo la gnod pa yod ma min/ /gti mug rang bzhin sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste/ /des gang bcom ma bden par snang de ni/ /kun rdzob bden zhes thub pa des gsungs te/ /bcos ma
251a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i dngos ni kun rdzob tu'o/ /rab rib mthu yis skra shad la sogs pa'i/ /ngo bo log pa gang zhig rnam brtags pa/ /de nyid bdag nyid gang du mig dag pas/ /mthong de de nyid de bzhin 'dir shes gyis/ /gal te
251a2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten tshad ma yin na ni/ /'jig rten de nyid mthong bas 'phags gzhan gyis/ /ci dgos 'phags pa'i lam gyi ci zhig bya/ /blun po tshad mar rigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rnam kun 'jig rten tshad min de yi phyir/ /de nyid skabs su 'jig
251a3(mdo 'grel): rten gnod pa med/ /'jig rten don ni 'jig rten grags nyid kyis/ /gal te sel na 'jig rten gyis gnod 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'jig rten sa bon tsam btab nas/ /bdag gis bu 'di bskyed ces smra byed cing/ /shing yang gtsugs so/
251a4(mdo 'grel): snyam du rtogs des na/ /gzhan las skye ba 'jig rten las kyang med/ /gang phyir myu gu sa bon las gzhan min/ /de phyir myug tshe sa bon zhig pa med/ /gang phyir gcig nyid yod min de phyir yang/ /myug tsha sa bon yod ces
251a5(mdo 'grel): brjod mi bya/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid brten 'gyur na/ /de la byung bas dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir/ /stong nyid dngos po 'jig pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ni rigs min de phyir dngos yod min/ /gang phyir dngos po 'di dag rnam dpyad na//
251a6(mdo 'grel): de nyid bdag can dngos las tshu rol tu/ /gnas rnyed ma yin de phyir 'jig rten gyi/ /tha snyad bden la rnam par dpyad mi bya/ /de nyid skabs su rigs pa gang zhig gis/ /bdag dang gzhan la skye ba rigs min pa/ /rigs des tha snyad
251a7(mdo 'grel): du yang rigs min pas/ /khyod kyi skye ba gang gis yin par 'gyur/ /dngos po stong pa gzugs brnyan la sogs pa/ /tshogs la bltos rnams pa grags pa yang min/ /ji ltar dar? ni gzugs brnyan sogs stong las/ /shes pa de
251b1(mdo 'grel): yi nam pa skye 'gyur ltar/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad stong na yang/ stong nyid dag las rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /bden pa gnyis suAng rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /de dag rtag pa ma yin chad pa'ang min/ /gang phyir rang bzhin gyis de mi 'gag
251b2(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de phyir kun gzhi med kyang 'di nas phyir/ /la lar las 'gags yun ring lon las kyang/ /'bras bu yang dag 'byung bar rig par gyis/ /rmi lam dmigs pa'i yul dag mthong nas ni/ /sad kyang blun la chags ba skye 'gyur pa/ /de
251b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'gags shing rang bzhin yod min pa'i/ /las las kyang ni 'bras bu yod pa yin/ /ji ltar yul ni yod nyid min mtshungs kyang/ /rab rib can gyis skra shad rnam par ni/ /mthong gi dngos gzhan rnam par ma yin ltar/ /de bzhin smin  
251b4(mdo 'grel): las slar smin min shes kyis/ /da phyir rnam smin mi dge nag pa'i las/ /rnam smin dge nyid dgo las yin mthong zhing/ /dge mi dge med blo can thar 'gyur te/ /las 'bras rnams la sems pa'ang dgag pa mdzad/ /kun gzhi yod cing gang zag
251b5(mdo 'grel): nyid yod la/ /phung po 'di dag 'ba' zhig nyid yod ces/ /bstan pa 'di ni de ltar ches zab don/ /rigs par mi 'gyur gang yin de la'o/ /'jig tshogs lta dang bral yang sangs rgyas kyis/ /ji ltar nga dang nga yi bstan pa ltar/ /de bzhin dngos
251b6(mdo 'grel): rnams rang bzhin med mod kyi/ /yod ces drang don nyid du bstan pa yin/ /gzung ba med par 'dzin pa ma mthong zhing/ /srid gsum rnam shes tsam du rab rtogs pas/ /shes rab la gnas byang chub sems dpa' des/ /rnam shes tsam du de
251b7(mdo 'grel): nyid rtogs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar rlung gis bskul bas rgya mtsho ni/ /che las chu rlabs 'byung ba de bzhin du/ /kun gyi sa bon kun gzhi zhes bya las/ /rang gi nus pas rnam shes tsam zhig 'byung/ /de phyir gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo gang/ /dngos
252a1(mdo 'grel): btags par yod pa'i rgyur 'gyur zhing/ /phyi rol gzung ba med par 'byung 'gyur la/ /yod dang spros kun yul min rang bzhin yod/ /phyi rol med sems dpe ni gang du yod/ /rmi lam ji bzhin zhen de bsam bya/ /gang
252a2(mdo 'grel): tshe nga la rmi lam na yang sa mas/ /yod min de tshe khyod kyi dpe yod min/ /gal te sad tshe rmi lam dran las yid/ /yod na phyi rol  yul yang de bzhin 'gyur/ /ji ltar khyod kyi nga mthong snyam dran pa/ /de 'dra phyi rol la yang yod pa yin//
252a3(mdo 'grel): gal te gnyid na mig blo mi srid pas/ /yod min yid kyi shes pa kho na yod/ /de yi rnam pa phyi rol nyid du zhe na/ /rmi lam ji lta de bzhin 'dir 'dod na/ /ji ltar khyod kyi phyi yul rmi lam du/ /ma skyes de bzhin yid kyang skyes ma yin//
252a4(mdo 'grel): mig dang mig gi yul dang des bskyed sems/ /gsum po thams cad kyang ni rdzun pa yin/ /rna sogs lhag ma gsum po'ang skye ba med/ /rmi lam ji lta de bzhin sad 'dir yang/ /dngos rnams rdzun yin sems de yod ma yin/ /spyod
252a5(mdo 'grel): yul med cing dbang po rnams kyang med/ /'di na ji ltar sang bzhin ji srid du/ /ma sang de srid de la gsum po yod/ /sang par gyur na gsum char yod min ltar/ /gti mug gnyid zad las de de bzhin no/ /dbang po rab rib bcas pa blo
252a6(mdo 'grel): gang gis/ /rab rib mthu las skra rnams gang mthong ba/ /de blo la bltos gnyis char bden pa ste/ /don gsal mthong la gnyis ka'ang rdzun pa yin/ /gal te shes bya med par blo yod na/ /skra de'i yul dang mig ni nges 'brel ba'i//
252a7(mdo 'grel): rab rib med la'ang skra shad blor 'gyur na/ /de lta ma yin de phyir de yod min/ /gang phyir mthong ba dag la blo nus ni/ /smin med de phyir de la blo mi 'gyur/ /shes bya yod dngos bral bas min zhe na/ /nus de med pas 'di ni 'grub
252b1(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ /skyes la nus pa srid pa yod ma yin/ /ma skyes ngo bo la yang nus yod min/ /khyad par med par khyad par can yod min/ /mo gsham bu la'ang de ni yod par thal/ /gal te 'byung bar 'gyur bas bsnyad 'dod na/ /nus pa med par 'di yi
252b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung 'gyur med/ /phan tshun don la brten pa'i 'grub pa ni/ /grub min nyid ces bam pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /gal te 'gags pa'i nus smin las 'gyur na/ /gzhan gyi nus pa las gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyu can rnams der phan tshun
252b3(mdo 'grel): tha dad yod/ /de phyir thams cad kun las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gal te der na rgyun can tha dad kyi/ /de dag la rgyun tha dad med de'i phyir/ /nyes med ce na 'di ni bsgrub bya zhig /tha mi dad? rgyun skabs mi rigs phyir ro/ /byams pa nyer sbas la brten
252b4(mdo 'grel): chos rnams ni/ /gzhan nyid phyir ni rgyud gcig gtogs min te/ /gang dag rang mtshan nyid kyi so so ba/ /de dag rgyud gcig gtogs pa rigs ma yin/ /mig blo skye ba rang nus gang dag las/ /de ma 'og tu kun nas skye 'gyur zhing/ /rang
252b5(mdo 'grel): gi rnam shes rten gyi nus de la/ /dbang po gzugs can mig ces bya bar rtogs/ 'di na dbang po las byung rnam par rig/ phyi gzung med par rang gi sa bon las/ /sngo sogs snang nyid 'byung bar ma rtogs nas/ /skye bos phyi rol gzung
252b6(mdo 'grel): bar sems khas len/ /rmi lam na ni gzugs don gzhan med par/ /rang nus smin las de yi rnam can sems/ /'byung ba ji lta de bzhin sad la'ang 'dir/ /phyi rol med par yid ni yod tsa na/ /ji ltar mig med par ni rmi lam du/ /sngo sogs
252b7(mdo 'grel): snang ba'i yid sems 'byung de ltar/ /mig dbang med par rang gi sa bon ni/ /smin las long ba la bder ces mi skye/ /gal te khyod ltar rmi lam drug pa yi/ /nus pa smin yod sang par med gyur na/ /drug pa'i nus smin ji ltar 'dir med pa//
253a1(mdo 'grel): de ltar rmi tshe med ces cis mi rigs/ /ji ltar mig med 'di yi rgyu min ltar/ /rmi lam du yang gnyid ni rgyu ma yin/ /de phyir rmi lam du yang de dngos mig/ rdzun pa'i yul can rtogs pa'i rgyur khas blang/ /'di yis lan ni
253a2(mdo 'grel): gang dang gang btab pa/ /de dang de ni dam bca' mtshungs mthong bas/ /rtsod 'di sel byed sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /'gar yang dngos po yod ces ma bstan to/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bla ma'i man ngag las/ /keng rus kyis grangs
253a3(mdo 'grel): gzhi mthong ba gang/ /der yang gsum char skye ba med par mthong/ /log pa yid la byed par bstan phyir ro/ /khyod kyi dbang blo'i yul rnams ji lta ba/ /de ltar mi sdug yid kyi yang 'gyur na/ /de bzhin yul der blo gtang cig shos kyis//
253a4(mdo 'grel): rtogs 'gyur de ni rdzun par yang mi 'gyur/ /rab rib dang ldan dbang po can mtshungs pa/ /chu 'bab klung la yi dags rnag bla yang/ /mdor na ji ltar shes bya med de bzhin/ /glo yang med ces don 'di shes par gyis/ /gal te gzung
253a5(mdo 'grel): med 'dzin pa nyid bral zhing/ /gnyis kyis stong pa'i gzhan dbang dngos yod na/ /'di yi yod pa gang gis shes par 'gyur/ /ma bzung bar yang yod ces byar mi rung/ /de nyid kyis de myong bar grub ma yin/ /gal te phye dus dran pa
253a6(mdo 'grel): las 'grub na/ /ma grub bsgrubs par bya phyir brjod ba yi/ /ma grub 'di ni sgrub par byed pa min/ /rang rig pa ni grub la rag mod kyi/ /de lta'ang dran pa'i dran pa rigs min te/ /gzhan phyir ma shes rgyud la skyes pa bzhin/ /gtan
253a7(mdo 'grel): tshigs 'dis ni khyad par dag kyang 'joms/ /gang phyir gang gis yul myong gyur de las/ /dran pa 'di gzhan nga la yod min pa/ /de phyir nga yis mthong snyam dran 'gyur te/ /'di yang 'jig rten tha snyad tshul lugs yin/ /de phyir rang
253b1(mdo 'grel): gi yod pa ma yin na/ /khyod kyi gzhan dbang gang gis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /byed po las dang bya ba gcig min pas/ /de nyid kyis de 'dzin par rigs ma yin/ /gal te skye ba med cing ma shes pa'i/ /bdag can gzhan dbang ngo bo'i dngos yod na/
253b2(mdo 'grel): gang gis na 'di yod par mi rigs pa /gzhan la mo gsham bus gnod ci zhig bskyal/ /gang tshe gzhan dbang cung zad yod min na/ /kun rdzob pa yi rgyur ni gang zhig 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi ltar na rdzas la chags pa yis/ /'jig rten grags
253b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam bzhag kun kyang brlab/ /slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyi lam la ni/ /phyi rol gyur la zhi ba'i thabs med do/ /de dag kun rdzob de nyid bden las nyams/ /de las nyams pas thar pa 'grub yod min/ /tha snyad bden pa thabs su gyur pa
253b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /don dam bden pa thabs byung gyur pa ste/ /de gnyis rnam dbye gang gang gis ma shes pa/ /de ni rnam rtog log pas lam ngan zhugs/ /ji ltar khyod kyis gzhan dbang dngos 'dod ltar/ /kun rdzob kyang ni bdag gis khas ma blangs//
253b5(mdo 'grel): 'bras phyir 'di dag med kyang yod do zhes/ /'jig rten ngor byas bdag ni smra bar byed/ /ji ltar phung po spangs nas zhir zhugs pa/ /dgra bcom rnams la yod pa min de ltar/ /'jig rten la yang med na de bzhin 'di/ /'jig rten las kyang
253b6(mdo 'grel): yod ces bdag mi smra/ /gal te khyod la 'jig rten mi gnod na/ /'jig rten nyid bltos 'di ni dgag par gyis/ /khyod dang 'jig rten 'dir ni rtsod gyis dang/ /phyi nas stobs ldan bdag gis brten par bya/ /mngon gyur mngon phyogs byang
253b7(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' yis/ /srid gsum rnam shes tsam du gang rtogs pa/ /rtag bdag byed po bkag pa rtogs phyir des/ /byed pa po ni sems tsam yin par rtogs/ /de phyir blo ldan blo ni 'phel bya'i phyir/ /lang kar gshegs mdo de
254a1(mdo 'grel): las kun mkhyen gyis/ /mu stegs spo mthon ri 'joms dag rang bzhin/ /rdo rje 'di ni dgongs pa bcad phyir gsungs/ /ji bzhin rang gi bstan bcos de de las/ /mu stegs rnams kyis gang zag sogs
254a2(mdo 'grel): de dag/ smras pa de dag byed por ma gzigs nas/ /rgyal bas sems tsam 'jig rten byed por gsungs/ /de nyid rgyas la sangs rgyas bsnyad ji bzhin/ /de bzhin sems tsam gtsor gyur 'jig rten la/ /mdo las sems tsam
254a3(mdo 'grel): zhes gsungs gzugs ni 'dir/ /'gog pa de ltar mdo yi don ma yin/ /gal te 'di dag sems tsam zhes mkhyen nas/ /de las gzugs nyid dgag par mdzad na ni/ /slar yang de las bdag nyid chen pos sems/ /gti
254a4(mdo 'grel): mug las las skyes par ci phyir gsungs/ /sems nyid kyis ni sems can 'jig rten dang/ /snod kyi 'jig rten shin tu sna tshogs 'god/ /'gro ba ma lus las las skyes par gsungs/ /sems spangs nas ni las kyang
254a5(mdo 'grel): yod ma yin/ /gal te gzugs yod mod kyi de la ni/ /sems bzhin byed pa po nyid yod ma yin/ /des na sems las gzhan pa'i byed pa po/ /bzlog gi gzugs ni bkag pa ma yin no/ /'jig rten pa yi de nyid la gnas
254a6(mdo 'grel): la/ /phung po 'jig rten grags de lngar char yod/ /de nyid ye shes 'char bar 'dor ba na/ /rnal 'byor pa la de lnga 'byung mi 'gyur/ gzugs med na ni sems yod ma 'dzin cig /sems yod nyid na'ang gzugs med ma
254a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin cig /de dag shes rab tshul mdor sangs rgyas kyis/ /mtshungs par spangs shing mngon pa'i chos las gsungs/ /bden gnyis rim pa 'di dag bshig nas kyang/ /khyod kyi rjes ni bkag pas 'grub mi
254b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de phyir de lta'i rim pas dngos 'dod nas/ /de nyid ma skyes 'jig rten skyes rig bya/ /mdo sde gang las phyi rol snang yod min/ /sems ni sna tshogs snang ngo zhes gsungs pa/ /gzugs la shin tu chags par de dag la/ /gzugs bzlog
254b2(mdo 'grel): pa ster? yang drang don nyid/ /'di ni ston pas drang don nyid gsungs shing/ /'di ni drang don nyid du rigs pas 'thad/ /rnam pa de lta'i mdo sde gzhan yang ni/ /drang don nyid du lung 'dis gsal bar byed/ /shes bya med na shes pa bsal ba ni/ bde glag
254b3(mdo 'grel): rnyed ces sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /shes bya med na shes pa bkag 'grub pas/ /dang por shes bya dgag pa mdzad pa yin/ /da ltar lung gi lo rgyus shes byas te/ /mdo gang de nyid ma yin bshad don can/ /drang don gsungs pa'ang rtogs
254b4(mdo 'grel): nas drang bya zhing/ /stong nyid don can nges don shes par gyis/ /gnyis lam skye ba'ang rigs pa'i ngo bo ma yin gang gi phyir/ /bshad zin nyes pa de dag thog tu 'bab pa yin phyir ro/ /'di ni 'jig rten las min de nyid du yang 'dod min te/ /gang
254b5(mdo 'grel): phyir re re las ni skye ba 'grub pa yod ma yin/ /gal te rgyu med kho nar skye bar lta zhig 'gyur na ni/ /de tshe mdza' dag rtag tu thams cad las kyang skye 'gyur zhing/ /'bras 'byung ched du 'jig rten 'di yi sa bon la sogs ni/ /brgya phrag dag gi sgo nas
254b6(mdo 'grel): sdud par byed par yang mi 'gyur/ /gal te 'gro ba rgyu yis stong par gyur na nam mkha' yi /utpal yi dri mdog ji bzhin gzung du med nyid na/ /shin tu ches bkra'i 'jig rten 'dzin pa'ang yin de'i phyir/ /rang gi blo bzhin 'jig rten rgyu las yin
254b7(mdo 'grel): par shes par gyis/ /'byung ba de dag bdag nyid gang zhig gis ni khyod kyi blo'i/ /yul du 'gyur ba de yi bdag nyid can ni ma yin na/ gang la yid kyi mun pa 'thug po 'di nyid du yod pa/ /des ni ji ltar 'jig rten pha rol yang dag rtogs
255a1(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol 'gog par byed pa'i dus su bdag nyid ni/ /shes bya'i rang bzhin phyin ci log tu lta bar rtogs bya ste/ de yi lta ba'i rnam pa'i rten mtshungs lus dang ldan nyid phyir/ /gang tshe 'byung ba'i
255a2(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid yang nyid khas len de tshi bzhin/ /'byung bde dag ji ltar yod min de ltar bshad zin te/ gang gi phyir na gong du rang gzhan las dang gnyis ka las/ /skye dang rgyu med thun mong du ni bkag zin de yi phyir/ /ma bshad 'byung
255a3(mdo 'grel): ba 'di dag lta zhig yod dam ma yin no/ /gang gi phyir na bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las skye dang/ /rgyu la ma bltos yod pa min pas dngos rnams rang bzhin bral/ /gang gis sprin tshogs dang mtshungs gti mug stug po
255a4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten la/ /yod pa des na yul rnams log pa dag tu snang bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar rab rib mthu yis 'ga' zhig skra shad zla gnyis dang/ /rma bya'i mdongs dang sbrang ma la sogs lag par 'dzin byed pa/ /de bzhin du ni gti
255a5(mdo 'grel): mug skyon gyi dbang gis mi mkhas pas/ /'dus byas la zhig sna tshogs blo gros kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /gal te gti mug brtan na las 'byung gti mug med par de/ /mi 'byung zhes byar mi mkhas kho nas rtog par gong
255a6(mdo 'grel): ma chag /blo bzang nyi mas mun pa stug po rnam par bsal ba yi/ /mkhas pa dag ni stong nyid khong du chud cing grol bar 'gyur/ /gal te dngos rnams de nyid du med na/ /tha snyad du yang mo gsham bu ji bzhin/ /de dag med pa nyid
255a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur de yi phyir/ /de dag rang bzhin gyis ni yod pa nyid/ /gang dag rab rib can sogs yul 'gyur ba/ /skra shad la sogs de dag ma skyes pas/ /re zhig de dag nyid la brtsad bya ste/ /phyi nas ma rig rab rib rjes 'brel
255b1(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /gal te rmi lam dri za'i grong khyer bcas/ /smig rgyu'i chu dang mig 'phrul gzugs brnyan sogs/ /skye med mthong na yod nyid min mtshungs kyang/ /khyod la ji ltar der 'gyur de mi rigs/ /de nyid du 'di ji ltar skye med kyang/ /mo gsham
255b2(mdo 'grel): bu ltar gang phyir 'jig rten gyi/ /mthong ba'i yul du mi 'gyur ma yin pa/ /de yi phyir na smra 'di ma nges pa'o/ /mo gsham bu la rang gi bdag nyid kyis/ /skye ba de nyid du med 'jig rten duAng/ /yod min de bzhin dngos 'di kun ngo bo/ /nyid kyis 'jig rten
255b3(mdo 'grel): de nyid du ma skyes/ /de phyir 'di ltar ston pas chos rnams kun/ /gdod nas zhi zhing skye bral rang bzhin gyis/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa gsungs gyur la/ /de phyir rtag tu skye ba yod ma yin/ /bum sogs 'di dag de nyid du med cing/ /'jig rten rab
255b4(mdo 'grel): tu grags par yod ci bzhin/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad 'gyur bas na/ /mo gsham bu dang mtshungs par thal mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir rgyu med pa dang dbang phyug gi /rgyu la sogs dang bdag gzhan gnyi ga las/ /dngos rnams skye bar 'gyur
255b5(mdo 'grel): ba ma yin pa/ /de phyir brten nas rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir dngos po brten nas rab 'byung bas/ /rtog pa 'di dag brtag par mi nus pa/ /de phyir brten 'byung rigs pa 'di yis ni/ /lta ngan dra ba mdza' dag gcod par byed/ /rtog rnams dngos
255b6(mdo 'grel): po yod na 'byung ba ste/ /dngos po ji ltar med par yongs dpyad zin/ /dngos po med par 'di rnams mi 'byung dper/ /bud shing med par me yod min de bzhin/ /so so'i skye bo rnams ni rtog pas bcings/ /mi rtog rnal 'byor pa ni grol 'gyur
255b7(mdo 'grel): bas/ /rtog rnams log par gyur pa gang yin de/ /rnam par dpyod pa'i 'bras bur mkhas rnams gsung/ /bstan bcos las dpyad rtsod la chags pa'i phyir/ /ma mdzad rnam grol phyir ni de nyid bstan/ /gal te de nyid rnam par bshad pa na/
256a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan gzhung 'jig par 'gyur na nyes pa med/ /rang gi lta la chags dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan gyi lta la 'khrug gang rtog pa nyid/ /de phyir 'dod chags khong khro rnam bsal te/ /rnam dpyod pa ni myur du grol bar 'gyur/ /nyon
256a2(mdo 'grel): mongs skyon rnams ma lus 'jig tshogs la/ /lta las byung bar blo yis mthong gyur cing/ bdag ni 'di yi yul du rtogs byas nas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bdag ni 'gog par byed/ /za po rtag dngos byed po min pa'i bdag/ yon tan bya med mu
256a3(mdo 'grel): stegs rnams kyis brtags/ /de'i dbye cung zad cung zad la brten nas/ /mu stegs can rnams lugs ni tha dad 'gyur/ /mo gsham bu ltar skye ba dang bral phyir/ /de ltar gyur pa'i bdag ni yod min zhing/ /'di ni ngar 'dzin rten duAng mi rigs
256a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /'di ni kun rdzob tu yang yod mi 'dod/ /gang phyir bstan bcos bstan bcos las de'i khyad/ /mu stegs rnams kyis gang bstan de kun la/ /rang grags ma skyes gtan tshigs kyis gnod ba/ /de phyir de byang kun kyang yod ma yin//
256a5(mdo 'grel): de phyir phung po las gzhan bdag med do/ /phung po ma gtogs de 'dzin ma grub phyir/ /'jig rten ngar 'dzin blo yi rten du yang/ /mi 'dod de rig min pa'ang bdag lta'i phyir/ /gang dag dud 'gror bskal mang rkyal gyur pa/ /de kyang ma
256a6(mdo 'grel): skyes rtag 'di ma mthong la/ /ngar 'dzin de dag la yang 'jug mthong ste/ /des na phung po las gzhan bdag 'ga' med/ /phung po las gzhan bdag grub med pa'i phyir/ /bdag lta'i dmigs pa phung po kho na'o/ /kha cig bdag lta'i rten
256a7(mdo 'grel): du phung po ni/ /lnga char yang 'dod kha cig sems gcig 'dod/ /gal te phung po bdag na de phyir de/ /mang bas bdag de dag kyang mang por 'gyur/ /bdag ni rdzas su 'gyur zhing der lta ba/ /rdzas la 'jug pas phyin ci log mi 'gyur//
256b1(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'das tshe nges par bdag chad 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das sngon skad cig dag la ni/ /skye 'jig byed po med pas de 'bras med/ /gzhan gyis bsags la gzhan gyis za bar 'gyur/ /de nyid du rgyud yod na skyon med na/ /sngar rnam dpyad tshe rgyud la nyes
256b2(mdo 'grel): bshad zin/ /de phyir phung po dang sems bdag mi rigs/ /'jig rten mdza' ldan la sogs med phyir ro/ /khyod kyi rnal 'byor bdag med mthong ba la/ /de tshe nges par dngos rnams med par 'gyur/ /rtag bdag spang na de tshe ngo yi phyir/ /khyod kyi
256b3(mdo 'grel): sems sam phung po bdag mi 'gyur/ /khyod kyi rnal 'byor bdag med mthong ba yis/ /gzugs sogs de nyid rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing/ /gzugs la dmigs nas 'jug phyir 'dod chags sogs/ /skye 'gyur de yi ngo bo rtogs med phyir/
256b4(mdo 'grel): gang phyir ston pas phung po bdag go zhes/ /gsungs pa da phyir phung po bdag 'dod na/ /de ni phung las gzhan bdag 'gog pa ste/ /gzugs bdag min sogs mdo gzhan gsungs phyir ro/ /gang phyir gzugs tshor bdag min 'du shes kyang
256b5(mdo 'grel): ma yin 'du byed rnams min rnam shes kyang/ /min par mdo gzhan las gsungs de yi phyir/ /mdor bstan phung po bdag ces bzhed ma yin/ /phung po bdag ces brjod tshe phung rnams kyi/ /tshogs pa yin gyi phung po'i ngo bo min/ /mgon min
256b6(mdo 'grel): 'dul ba'am dbang po nyid kyang min/ /de med phyir de tshogs pa ma yin no/ /de tshe de yi yan lag tshogs gnas rnams/ /shing rtag nyid 'gyur shing rta dang bdag mtshungs/ /mdo las phung po brten nas yin gsungs pa/ /de phyir phung po
256b7(mdo 'grel): 'dus tsam bdag ma yin/ /dbyibs zhe na de gzugs can la yod phyir/ /khyod la de dag nyid bdag ces 'gyur gyi/ /sems sogs tshogs ni bdag nyid 'gyur min te/ gang phyir de dag la dbyibs yod ma yin /len por rang nyer len
257a1(mdo 'grel): gcig rigs dngos min/ /de lta na las byed po gcig nyid 'gyur/ /byed po med las yod snyam blo yin na/ /ma yin gang phyir byed po med las med/ /gang phyir thub pas bdag de sa chu me/ /rlung dang rnam shes nam
257a2(mdo 'grel): mkha' zhes bya ba/ /khams drug dang ni mig sogs reg pa yi/ /rten drug dag la brten nas nyer bstan zhing/ /sems dang sems byung chos rnams nyer bzung nas/ /des gsungs de phyir de ni de rnams dang/ /de nyid ma yin tshogs tsam nyid
257a3(mdo 'grel): min te/ /de phyir ngar 'dzin blo de rnams la min/ /bdag med rtogs tshe rtog pa'i bdag spong zhing/ /'di ni ngar 'dzin rten duAng mi 'dod pa/ de phyir bdag med shes pas bdag lta ba/ /dpyis kyang 'byin zhes smra ba shin tu mtshar/ /rang khyim
257a4(mdo 'grel): rtsig phug sbrul gnas mthong bzhin du/ /'di na glang chen med ces dogs bsal te/ /sbrul gyi 'jigs pa'ang spong bar byed pa ni/ /kye ma gzhan gyi gnam por 'gyur nyid do/ /phung por bdag yod ma yin bdag la yang/ /phung po de rnams
257a5(mdo 'grel): yod min gang phyir 'dir/ /gzhan nyid yod na rtog pa 'dir 'gyur na/ /gzhan nyid de med de phyir 'di rtog pa'o/ /bdag ni gzugs ldan mi 'dod gang phyir bdag/ yod min de phyir ldan don sbyor ba med/ /gzhan na gnag ldan gzhan min
257a6(mdo 'grel): gzugs ldan na/ /bdag ni gzugs las de nyid gzhan nyid med/ /gzugs bdag ma yin bdag ni gzugs ldan min/ /gzugs la bdag med bdag la'ang gzugs yod min/ /de ltar rnam bzhir phung kun shes bya ste/ /de dag
257a7(mdo 'grel): bdag tu lta ba nyi shur 'dod/ /lta ri bdag med rtogs pa'i rdo rje yis/ /bcom bdag gang dang lhan cig 'jig 'gyur ba/ /'jig tshogs lta ri lhun stug la gnas pa/ /rtse mo mtho bar gyur pa 'di dag go /kha cig de nyid
257b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan nyid rtag mi rtag /la sogs brjod med gang zag rdzas yod 'dod/ /rnam shes drug gi shes byar de 'dod cing/ /de ni ngar 'dzin gzhir yang 'dod pa yin/ /gang phyir gzugs las sems brjod med mi rtogs/ /dngos yod brjod med
257b2(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa ma yin nyid/ /gal te bdag 'ga' dngos por grub gyur na/ /sems ltar grub dngos brjod du med mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir khyod bum dngos por ma grub pa'i/ /ngo bo gzugs sogs las brjod med 'gyur bas/ /bdag gang phung po
257b3(mdo 'grel): las brjod med 'gyur te/ /rang gis yod par grub bar rtogs mi bya/ /khyod kyi rnam shes rang bdag las gzhan ni/ /mi 'dod gzugs sogs las gzhan dngos 'dod cing/ /dngos la rnam pa de gnyis mthong 'gyur ba/ /de phyir bdag med
257b4(mdo 'grel): dngos chos dang bral phyir/ /de phyir ngar 'dzin rten ni dngos po min/ /phung las gzhan min phung po'i ngo bo min/ /phung po rten min 'di ni de ldan min/ /'di ni phung po rnams brten 'grub par 'gyur/ /shing rta rang yan lag las gzhan 'dod
257b5(mdo 'grel): min/ /gzhan min ma yin de ldan yang min zhing/ /yan lag ma yin yan lag dag der min/ /'dus pa tsam min dbyibs min ji bzhin no/ /gal te tshogs tsam zhing rtar 'gyur na ni/ /sil bur gnas la shing rta nyid yod 'gyur/ /gang
257b6(mdo 'grel): phyir yan lag can med yan lag dag /med pas dbyibs tsam shing rtar rigs pa'ang min/ /khyod dbyibs yan lag re re sngar yod gyur/ /ji bzhin shing rtar gtogs la'ang de bzhin na/ /bye bar gyur pa de dag la ji ltar/ /de ltar yang
257b7(mdo 'grel): ni shing rta yod ma yin/ /da lta gal te shing rta nyid du 'dir/ /'phang lo sogs la dbyibs tha dad yod na/ /'di gzung 'gyur na de yang yod min te/ /de phyir dbyibs tsam shing rtar yod ma yin/ /gang phyir khyod kyi tshogs pa cang med
258a1(mdo 'grel): pas/ /dbyibs de yan lag tshogs kyi ma yin na/ /gang zhig ci yang ma yin de brten nas/ /'dir ni dbyibs su lta zhig ji ltar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi 'di ni ji ltar 'dod de ltar/ /mi bden pa yi rgyu la brten byas nas
258a2(mdo 'grel): 'brus bu'i rnam ba mi bden rang bzhin can/ /thams cad kyang ni skye bar shes par gyis/ /'dis ni gzugs sogs de ltar gnas rnams la/ /bum blo zhes bya'ang rigs pa ma yin nyid/ /skye ba med pas gzugs sogs gyur yod min//
258a3(mdo 'grel): de yi phyir yang de dag dbyibs mi rigs/ /de ni de nyid du lam 'jig rten du/ /rnam pa bdun gyis 'grub 'gyur min mod kyi/ /rnam dpyad med par 'jig rten nyid las 'dir/ /rang gi yan lag brten nas 'dogs pa yin/ /de nyid
258a4(mdo 'grel): yan lag can de cha shas can/ /shing rta de nyid byed po zhes 'gror bsnyad/ /skye bo rnams le len po nyid du 'grub/ /'jig rten grags pa'i kun rdzob ma brlag cig/ rnam bdun gyis med gang de ji lta bur/ /yod ces rnal 'byor pas
258a5(mdo 'grel): 'di'i yod mi rnyad/ /des de nyid la'ang bde blag 'jug 'gyur pas/ /'dir de'i grub pa de bzhin 'dod par bya/ /shing rta yod nyid rmin na de yi tshe/ /yan lag can med de'i yan lag kyang med/ /shing rta tshig na yan lag med
258a6(mdo 'grel): des bzhin/ /blo med yan lag can bsregs yan lag go /de bzhin 'jig rten grags pas phung po dang/ /khams dang de bzhin skye mched drug brten nas/ /bdag kyang nye bar len pa nyid du 'dod/ /nyer len las yin 'di ni byed po'ang yin//
258a7(mdo 'grel): dngos yod min phyir 'di ni brten mir zhing/ /mi brtan nyid min 'di ni skye 'jig min/ /'di la rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yang/ /yod min de nyid dang ni gzhan nyid med/ /gang la rtag tu 'gro rnams ngar 'dzin blo/ /rab tu 'byung zhing de yi gang
258b1(mdo 'grel): yin der/ /nga yir 'dzin blo 'byung ba'i bdag de ni/ /ma rtags grags par gti mug las yin no/ /gang phyir byed po med can las med pa/ /de phyir bdag gi bdag med par yod min/ /de phyir bdag dang bdag gi stong lta zhing/ /rnal 'byor ba de rnam par
258b2(mdo 'grel): grol bar 'gyur/ /bum pa snam bu de lde dmag dang nags tshal phreng ba ljon shing dang/ /khang khyim shing rta phran dang 'gron gnas la sogs dngos rnams gang dag dang/ /de bzhin gang dag sgo nas skye 'dis bsnyed pa de rnams rtogs bya ste/ /gang phyir thub
258b3(mdo 'grel): dbang de ni 'jig rten lhan cig cod mi mdzad phyir ro/ /yan lag yon tan 'dod chags mtshan nyid dang ni bud shing la sogs dang/ /yon tan can yan lag can chags dang mtshan gzhi me la sogs don dag/ de rnams shing rta'i rnam dpyad byas
258b4(mdo 'grel): pas rnam bdun yod pa ma yin zhing/ /de las gzhan du gyur par 'jig rten grags pa'i sgo nas yod pa yin/ /gal te rgyu yis bskyed par bya bskyed de lta na de rgyu yin zhing/ /gal te 'bras bu mi skyed na ni de med rgyu med can du 'gyur/ /'bras bu
258b5(mdo 'grel): yang ni rgyu yod gyur na skye bar 'gyur ba de yi phyir/ /gang las gang zhig 'gyur ba gang zhig las sngar gang zhig 'gyur ba smros/ /gal te khyod kyi rgyu yis phrad nas 'bras skyed byed na de yi tshe/ /de dag nus pa gcig pas skyed byed 'bras bu tha dad med
258b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /so sor na ni rgyu 'di rgyu min rnams dang khyad par med 'gyur la/ /gnyis po 'di dag spangs nas rtog pa gzhan yang yod par 'gyur ma yin/ /ci ste khyod kyi rgyu yis 'bras bu skyed par mi byed de phyir 'bras/ /zhes bya yod min 'bras bral
258b7(mdo 'grel): rgyu ni rgyu med can 'gyur yod pa'ang min/ /gang phyir 'di dag gnyis char yang ni sgyu ma dang 'dra de yi phyir/ /bdag la skyon du mi 'gyur 'jig rten pa yi dngos po rnams kyang yod/ /sun 'byin 'das? sun dbyung bya phrad nas 'byin/ /ma ma phrad par/ /yid
259a1(mdo 'grel): zhes nyes pa 'dir na khyod la'ang 'gyur ba ma yin nam/ /gang tshe de skad smra zhing rang phyogs kho na rnam 'joms pa/ /de tshe khyod kyis sun dbyung sun ni 'byin par nus ma yin/ /gang phyir rang gi tshig la'ang thal ba mtshungs pa'i
259a2(mdo 'grel): ltag tshod kyis/ /rigs pa med par dngos mdza' dag la skur 'debs de yi phyir/ /khyod ni skye bo dam pas bzhed mi 'gyur zhing gang mi phyir/ /khyod la rang phyogs med pas sun ci phyin du rgol pa'ang yin/ /sun 'byin pas sun dbyung bya ma phrad
259a3(mdo 'grel): sun ni 'byin byed dam/ /'on te phrad nas yin zhes smras zin nyes pa 'dir gang la/ /nges par phyogs yod de la 'gyur gyi bdag la phyogs 'di ni/ /yod pa min pas thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ni srid ma yin/ /ji ltar khyod kyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
259a4(mdo 'grel): yod khyad par rnams/ /gzugs brnyan la yang gzas bzung la sogs rnams tshe mthong 'gyur la/ /nyi ma dang ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phrad dang ma phrad par/ /mi rigs mod kyi brten nas tha snyad tsam zhig 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /mi bden bzhin
259a5(mdo 'grel): duAng rang gi byad bzhin mdzes par bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /de ni yod pa ji ltar de bzhin 'dir yang shes rab gdong/ /sbyang bar bya la nus pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gtan tshigs ni/ /'thad pa dang bral las kyang bsgrub bya rtogs zhes shes par
259a6(mdo 'grel): byar gal te rang gi bsgrub bya go byed gtan tshigs dngos grub dang/ /dngos su go ba nyid 'gyur bsgrub bya'i ngo bo'ang yod gyur na/ /phrad pa la sogs rigs pa nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur zhig na/ /de yang yod pa min pas khyed kyi yi chad 'ba' 
259a7(mdo 'grel): zhig yin/ /dngos nams mdza' dag dngos por med par rtogs su gzhugs par ni/ /nus bar chos sla ji ltar rang bzhin gzhan dag la/ /khong du chud par bde blag tu na nus pa ma yin no/ /rtog ge ngan pa'i dra bas 'jig rten ci ste 'dir
259b1(mdo 'grel): bcal byed/ /sun 'byin lhag ma gong du bstan pa yang ni shes byas nas/ /phrad pa la sogs phyogs kyi lan gyis ched du 'dir gtang bya/ /sun ci phyin du rgol ba pa yang ji ltar yod min pa/ /de skad sngar bshad lhag ma phyogs 'di nyid kyis rtogs par
259b2(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /bdag med 'di ni 'gro ba rnam dgrol phyir/ /chos dang gang zag dbye ba rnam gnyis gsungs/ /de ltar ston pas slar yang 'di nyid ni/ /gdul ba rnams la phye ste rnam med gsungs/ /spros dang bcas bar stong pa nyid/ /bcu drug bshad zhes
259b3(mdo 'grel): mdor bsdus te/ /slar yang gzhir bshad de dag ni/ /theg chen du yang bzhed pa yin/ /gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/ /yin phyir mig ni mig gis stong/ /de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus dang yid kyang bsnyad par bya/ /ther zug gnas pa ma yin
259b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'jig pa ma yin nyid kyi phyir/ /mig la sogs pa drug po yi/ /rang bzhin med nyid gang yin pa/ de ni nang stong nyid du 'dod/ /gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/ /yin phyir gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong/ /sgra dang dri ro reg bya dang/ chos rnams
259b5(mdo 'grel): nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /gzugs sogs rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /phyi rol stong pa nyid du 'dod/ /gnyis char rang bzhin med nyid ni/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yin no/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /mkhas pas stong pa nyid ces bsnyad/ /stong
259b6(mdo 'grel): nyid de yang stong nyid kyi/ /ngo bos stong par 'dod pa yin/ /stong nyid zhes bya'i stong nyid gang/ /stong nyid stong nyid du 'dod do/ /stong nyid dngos po'i blo can gyi/ /'dzin pa bzlog phyir gsungs pa yin/ /sems can snod kyi 'jig rten na//
259b7(mdo 'grel): ma lus khyab byed nyid phyir dang/ /tshad med pa yis mu mdza' ni/ /med phyir phyogs rnams chen po nyid/ /'di dag bcu car phyogs rnams kyis/ /stong pa nyid ni gang yin de/ /chen po stong pa nyid yin de/ /chen por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir
260a1(mdo 'grel): gsungs/ /de ni dgos pa mchog yin pas/ /don dam mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /de ni de yis stong nyid gang/ /de ni don dam stong nyid de/ /myang 'das dngos po'i blo can gyi/ /'dzin pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir/ /don dam pa'i?
260a2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pas don dam pa/ /stong pa nyid ni bstan par mdzad/ /rkyen las byung phyir khams gsum po/ /'dus byas yin par nges par bsnyad/ /de ni de yi stong nyid gang/ /de ni 'dus byas stong nyid gsungs/ /gang la skye gnas mi rtag? nyid//
260a3(mdo 'grel): de dag med pa 'dus ma byas/ /de ni de yis stong nyid gang/ /de ni 'dus ma byas stong nyid/ /gang la mdza' ni yod min pa/ /da ni mdza' las 'das par brjod/ /de de kho nas stong pa nyid/ /mdza' las 'das pa stong nyid bsnyad//
260a4(mdo 'grel): thog ma dang po tha ma mdza' / /de dag med pas 'khor ba ni/ /thog ma tha ma med par brjod/ /'gro 'ong bral phyir rmi lam lte'i/ /srid 'di de yis dben nyid gang/ /de ni thog ma dang tha ma/ /med pa stong pa nyid do zhes/ /bstan bcos las
260a5(mdo 'grel): ni nges par bsnyad/ /dor ba zhes bya 'thor ba dang/ /'bor ba la ni nges par brjod/ /dor med gtong ba med pa ste/ /'ga' yang dor med gang yin pa'o/ /dor ba med pa de nyid kyis/ /de nyid stong pa nyid gang yin/ /de? de'i phyir na dor med pa//
260a6(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid ces bya bar brjod/ /'dus byas la sogs ngo bo nyid/ /gang phyir slob ma rang sangs rgyas/ /rgyal sras de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /ma mdzad de'i phyir 'dus byas la/ /sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid/ /rang bzhin
260a7(mdo 'grel): nyid du bsnyad pa ste/ /de nyid kyis de stong nyid gang/ /de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /khams bco brgyad dang reg drug dang/ /de las byung ba'i tshor drug dang/ /gzugs can gzugs can min de bzhin/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas
260b1(mdo 'grel): chos rnams/ /chos de dag ni thams cad kyi/ /de dag gis dben stong nyid gang/ /gzugs rung la sogs dngos med gang/ /de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/ /gzugs ni gzugs rung mtshan nyid can/ /tshor ba myong ba'i bdag nyid can/ /'du
260b2(mdo 'grel): shes mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/ /'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa'o/ /yul la so sor rnam rig pa/ /rnam shes rang gi mtshan nyid do/ /phung po sdug bsngal rang mtshan nyid/ /khams kyi bdag nyid sprul gdug 'dod/ /skye mched rnams ni sangs
260b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyis/ /skye ba'i sgor gyur nyid du gsungs/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang/ /de ni 'du 'phrod mtshan nyid do/ /gtong ba sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /tshul khrims gdung med mtshan nyid bzod/ /khro med mtshan nyid brtson 'grus kyi/ /kha na ma tho
260b4(mdo 'grel): med nyid do/ /bsam gtan sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /shes rab chags med mtshan nyid de/ /pha rol phyin pa drug rnams kyi/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag yin par brjod/ /bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang/ /de bzhin gzhan gang gzugs
260b5(mdo 'grel): med pa/ /de dag yang dag mkhyen pa yis/ /mi 'khrugs mtshan nyid can du gsungs/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun/ /nges par 'byung byed rang mtshan nyid/ /stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /dmigs pa med pas rnam dben nyid/ /
260b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa'i nyid de/ /gsum pa'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal dang/ /gti mug med rnam thar rnams kyi/ /mtshan nyid rnam par grol byed pa'o/ /stobs rnams shin tu rnam par ni/ /gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin gsungs/ /skyob
260b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ /shin tu brtan pa'i ngo bo yin/ /so sor yang dag rig rnams ni/ /spobs sogs chad med mtshan nyid can/ /'gro la phan pa nyer sgrub pa/ /byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /sdug bsngal can rnams yongs skyob
261a1(mdo 'grel): pa/ /thugs rje chen po'o dga' ba ni/ /rab dga' i mtshan nyid btang snyoms ni/ /ma 'dres mtshan nyid can shes bya/ /sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa bcu dang brgyad du gang 'dod dag /gang phyir ston res mi 'phrogs
261a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de phyir mi 'phrogs rang mtshan nyid/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes ni/ /mngon sum mtshan nyid can du 'dod/ /gzhan ni nyi tshe ba nyid kyis/ /mngon sum zhes bya ba mi 'dod do/ /gang zhig 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang/ /'dus ma byas
261a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid gang/ /de de kho nas stong pa nyid/ /de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/ /da ltar ba 'di mi gnas shing/ /'das dang ma 'ongs yong ma yin/ gang du de dag mi dmigs pa/ /de la mi dmigs pa zhes brjod/ /mi dmigs
261a4(mdo 'grel): pa de rang ngo bo/ /de yis dben pa nyid gang de/ /ther zug gnas mi 'jig min pa/ mi dmigs zhes bya'i stong nyid do/ /rkyen las byung phyir dngos rnams la/ /'dus pa pa yi ngo bo med/ /'dus pa ba ni de nyid kyis/ /stong nyid
261a5(mdo 'grel): dngos med stong nyid do/ /dngos po'i sgras ni mdor bsdus na/ /phung po lnga rnams brjod pa yin/ /de rnams de yis stong nyid gang/ de dngos stong pa nyid du bshad/ /mngon bsdus na ni dngos med pa/ 'dus ma byas chos rnams la brjod/ /de
261a6(mdo 'grel): nyid dngos med des stong nyid/ /dngos po med pa stong nyid do/ /rang bzhin ngo bo nyid med ni/ /rang bzhin zhes bya'i stong nyid de/ /'di ltar rang bzhin ma byas pas/ /rang bzhin zhes ni bya bar bsnyad/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba 'am/ /ma byung
261a7(mdo 'grel): yang rung dngos su na/ /dngos po kun gyi stong pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi ngo bos por rab tu bsgrags/ /yang dag mdza' dang de bzhin nyid/ /de gzhan dngos po'i stong nyid do/ /shes rab pha rol phyin tshul las/ /de dag de skad rab tu bsgrags//
261b1(mdo 'grel): de ltar blo gros zer gyis snang ba gsal byas pa/ /rang gi lag na gnas pa'i skyu ru ra bzhin du/ /srid gsum 'di dag ma lus gdod nas skye med par/ /rtogs te tha snyad bden pa'i stobs kyis 'gog par 'gro/ /rtag tu 'gog par gtogs
261b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i bsam ldan yin mod kyi/ /'gro ba mgon med pa la snying rje'ang skyed par byed/ /de gong bde gshegs gsung skyes sangs rgyas 'bring bcas ni/ /ma lus pa rnams blo yis pham par byed pa'ang yin/ /kun rdzob de nyid gsheg? yangs dkar
261b3(mdo 'grel): po rgyas gyur pa/ /dad pa'i rgyal po de ni skye bo'i dang pa yis/ /mdun du bder nas dge ba'i rlung gi shugs stobs kyis/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol mchog tu 'gro/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa drug pa'o// //
261b4(mdo 'grel): ring du song 'dir 'di ni skad cig dang/ /skad cig la ni 'gog par 'jug 'gyur zhing/ /thabs kyi pha rol phyin legs 'bar ba'ang 'thob/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa bdun pa'o// //yang yang sngar dge las
261b5(mdo 'grel): lhag thob bya'i phyir/ /gang du phyir mi ldog pa nyid 'gyur ba/ /mi g.yo de la bdag nyid che de 'jug /'di yi smon lam shin tu dag 'gyur zhing/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis 'gog las slong bar mdzad/ /chags pa med pa'i blo ni skyon rnams dag dang
261b6(mdo 'grel): lhan cig mi gnas phyir/ /sa brgyad pa la dri ma de dag rtsa bcas nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing/ /nyon mongs zad cing sa gsum bla mar gyur kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /'byor pa mkha' ltar mdza' bral ma lus 'thob par nus ma yin/ /'khor ba
261b7(mdo 'grel): 'gags kyang dbang rnams bcu po thob par 'gyur zhing de dag gis/ /srid pa'i 'gro bar rang gi bdag nyid sna tshogs ston par byed par 'gyur/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'o// //dgu pa la
262a1(mdo 'grel): ni de'i stobs lta zhig mdza' dag rdzogs bar dag 'gyur zhing/ /de bzhin yang dag rig chos rang gi yon tan yongs su dag pa'ang 'thob/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa dgu pa'o// //
262a2(mdo 'grel): bcu pa'i sa la de yis kun nas sangs rgyas rnams las dbang bskur ba/ /dam pa 'thob cing ye shes lhag par mchog tu byung ba 'gyur ba'ang yin/ /char sprin rnams las chu char 'bab pa ji ltar de bzhin 'gro rnams kyi/ /dge ba'i lo
262a3(mdo 'grel): tog ched du rgyal ba/ sras las kyang lhun grub chos char 'bab/ /dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems bskyed pa bcu pa'o// //de tshe 'dis ni sangs rgyas brgya mthong zhing/ /de dag byin gyis brlabs kyang 'di yis rtogs/ /de
262a4(mdo 'grel): nyid tshe na bskal ba brgyar gnas shing/ /sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar yang yang dag 'jug /blo ldan ting 'dzin brgya phrag snyoms par 'jug cing gtong byed de/ /'jig rten khams brgya 'di yis kun nas g.yo zhing snang bar nus/ /de bzhin
262a5(mdo 'grel): rdzu 'phrul gyis de sems can brgya phrag smin byed cing/ /brgya phrag grangs dang rjes 'brel zhing dag tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /des ni chos kyi sgo rnams yang dag 'byed byed thub dbang sras/ /rang gi lus la lus rnams kun nas
262a6(mdo 'grel): stong par byed pa'ang yin/ /rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas mdzes 'byor lus ni re re zhing/ /rgyal ba'i sras po brgya phrag dag dang rjes su 'brel pa'ang ston/ /blo ldan rab tu dga' bar gnas pas yon tan de dag ni/ /thob par
262a7(mdo 'grel): gyur nas de bzhin kho nar dri ma med gnas pas/ /de dag stong ni yang dag 'thob par 'gyur te sa lnga po/ /'di dag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yis ni 'bum phrag dang/ /bye ba phrag brgya 'thob cing de yis bye ba stong 'gyur
262b1(mdo 'grel): 'thob/ /de nas bye ba brgya phrag stong 'gyur yang 'thob bye ba phrag /khrag khrig phrag brgyar rdzogs par bsgyur dang slar yang stong phrag tu/ /yang dag par ni bsgyur ba mdza' dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi g.yo'i sar gnas rnam rtog med
262b2(mdo 'grel): pa des/ /stong gsum brgya phrag stong bsdoms 'jig rten na/ /rdul tshad ji snyed yod pa de rnams dang/ /grangs mnyam yon tan dag ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /legs pa'i blo gros sa la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems nges sngar
262b3(mdo 'grel): bstan yon tan dag /grangs med brgya phrag stong du yang dag par/ /bsdoms pa phrag bcu'i rdul tshad thob par 'gyur/ re zhig bcu pa 'dir de'i yon tan dag /ngag gi spyod yul las chas 'das 'gyur zhing/ /ngag gi spyod yul
262b4(mdo 'grel): ma yin bsdoms rnams na/ /rdul dag ji snyad yod pa de snyed 'gyur/ /ba spu'i khung bur byang chub sems rnams dang/ /lhan cig rdzogs sangs rgyas sku 'grang 'das dang/ /de bzhin lha dang lha min mi dag kyang/ /skad cig skad cig la
262b5(mdo 'grel): ni ston par nus/ /gang phyir nam mkha' dri ma med la zla snyad? gsal bar gyur pa'i phyir/ /sngon tshe stobs bcu bskyed pa'i sa la khyod kyis slar yang 'bad gyur cing/ /'og min du ni gang gi don du 'bad gyur go 'phang mchog zhi ba//
262b6(mdo 'grel): yon tan mdza' dag mthar thug mtshungs pa med de khyad kyis brnyes/ /ji ltar snod kyi dbye bas mkha' la dbye ba med de ltar/ /dngos byas dbye ba 'ga' yang de nyid la med de yi phyir/ /ro mnyam nyid du yang dag thugs su chud pa mdzad
262b7(mdo 'grel): gyur na/ /mkhyen bzang khyod kyis skad cig gis ni shes bya thugs su chung/ /gang tshe zhi ba de nyid yin na de la blo gros 'jug mi 'gyur/ /blo ma zhugs par shes bya'i yul can nges par rigs kyang mi yin la/ /kun nas shes med
263a1(mdo 'grel): pa ni shes par ji ltar 'gyur te 'gal bar 'gyur/ /mkhyen po med par khyed kyis gzhan la 'di lta'o zhes su zhig ston/ /gang tshe skye med de nyid yin zhing blo yang skye ba dang bral ba/ /de tshe de rnams bsten las de yis
263a2(mdo 'grel): de nyid rtogs pa lta bu ste/ /ji ltar sems ni gang gi rnam pa cad du 'gyur ba de yis yul/ /de yongs shes pa de bzhin tha snyad brten nas rigs pa yin/ /de yi longs spyod rdzogs sku bsod nams kyis/ /zin dang sprul pa mkha' 
263a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan las de'i mthus/ /sgra yang chos kyi de nyid ston 'byung ba/ /de las 'jig rten gyis kyang de nyid rig /ji ltar rdza mkhan stobs chen ldan pas 'dir/ /yun ring ches 'bad pas bskor 'khor lo ni/ /de'i rtsol da ltar skyes
263a4(mdo 'grel): pa med bzhin duAng/ /'khor zhing bum pa la sogs rgyur mthong ltar/ /de bzhin da lta skyes rtsol med bzhin du/ /chos kyi bdag can sku nyid la bzhugs de'i/ /'jug pa skye bo'i dge dang smon lam gyi/ /khyad par gyis 'phangs
263a5(mdo 'grel): las ches bsam mi khyab/ /shes bya'i bud shing skam pa ma lus pa/ /bsregs pas zhi de rgyal rnams chos sku ste/ /de tshe skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/ /sems 'gags pas de sku yis mngon sum mdzad/ /zhi sku dpag bsam
263a6(mdo 'grel): shing ltar gsal gyur cing/ /yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin rnam mi rtog /'gro grol bar du 'jig rten 'byor slang rtag /'di ni spros dang bral la snang bar 'gyur/ /thub dbang dus gcig kho nar de'i rgyu mthun/ /gzugs sku gcig
263a7(mdo 'grel): la rang gi skye gnas skabs/ /sngar 'gags gsal dang ma 'tshol byung tshul ni/ /ma lus kyis bkra mdza' dag ston par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas zhing ji 'drar thub dbang de dang/ /de dag sku spyod mthu stobs ji 'dra dang/ /nyan
263b1(mdo 'grel): thos dge 'dun ji snyed ji lta dang/ /byang chub sems rnams der gzugs ji 'dra dang/ /ji 'dra'i chos dang der bdag ji 'dra dang/ /tshes thos spyod pa gang la spyad pa dang/ /sbyin gang ji tsam de dag la phul ba/ /de ni ma lus sku
263b2(mdo 'grel): gcig la ston mdzad/ /de bzhin tshul khrims bzod brtson ting 'dzin dang/ /shes rab spyod tshe sngar gyi gnas skabs gang/ /ma tshang med de dag nyid spyod pa kun/ /sku yi ba spu'i khung bur 'ang gsal bar ston/ /sangs rgyas gang dag
263b3(mdo 'grel): 'das dang 'byung 'gyur gang/ /gang dag da ltar nam mkha' i mthar thug par/ /gdangs mthon chos ston sdug bsngal gyis bzung ba'i/ /'gro dbugs 'byin zhing 'jig rten bzhugs pa dang/ /dang po'i thugs bzung byang chub snying
263b4(mdo 'grel): po'i bar/ /de dag spyod kun dngos rnams mig 'phrul gyi/ /rang bzhin mkhyen nas bdag bzhin pa spu yi/ /khung bur dus gcig la ni gsal bar ston/ /de bzhin dus gsum byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rang rgyal 'phags pa
263b5(mdo 'grel): nyon thos ma lus kyi/ /spyod dang de lhag skye bo'i gnas skabs ni/ /thams cad ba spu'i khung bur gcig tshe ston/ /dag pa 'di ni bzhed pa 'jug pa yis/ /rdul gcig gul la mkha' gtugs 'jig rten dang/ /'jig rten mdza' 
263b6(mdo 'grel): yas phyogs khyab rdul ston mod/ /rdul rags mi 'gyur 'jig rten phra mi 'gyur/ /rnam rtog mi mnga' khyod kyis srid mdza' i bar/ /skad cig de re re la spyod sna tshogs/ /ji snyed ston pa de snyed 'dzam bu gling/ /ma lus rdul gang
263b7(mdo 'grel): de snyad la grangs med/ /gnas dang gnas min mkhyen stobs dang/ /de bzhin las rnams smin blo dang/ /mos pa sna tshogs thugs chud dang/ /sna tshogs khams ni mkhyen stobs dang/ de bzhin dbang mchog mchog ma yin//
264a1(mdo 'grel): mkhyen dang thams cad du 'gro dang/ /bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin dang/ /snyoms par 'jug sogs blo stobs dang/ /sngon gnas dran pa mkhyen pa dang/ /de bzhin 'chi 'pho skye blo dang/ /zag rnams zad pa
264a2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen stobs te/ /stobs ni bcu po 'di dag go /rgyu gang zhig las gang zhig nges par skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni de yi gnas su de mkhyen rnams kyis gsungs/ /bshad pa las zlog gnas mi shes bya mdza' yas pa/ /mkhyen pa
264a3(mdo 'grel): thogs pa spangs pa de ni stobs su bshad/ /'dod dang mi 'dod de las bzlog dang zas dngos kyi/ /las dang de yi rnam smin shin tu sna tshogs la'ang/ /mkhyen pa nus mthu thogs med so sor 'jug 'gyur ba/ /dus gsum shes
264a4(mdo 'grel): bya khyab mdzad de ni stobs su 'dod/ /'dod chags sogs kyis 'byung ba'i stobs kyis 'dod pa ni/ /shin tu sna tshogs dman 'bring gang yang khyad 'phags 'dod/ /de las gzhan rnams kyis g.yogs mos la'ang mkhyen
264a5(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /dus gsum 'gro ba ma lus khyab pa stobs zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas khams kyi rnam par dbye la mkhas rnams kyi/ /mig sogs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang de khams su gsungs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
264a6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa mdza' yas shing/ /rnam kun khams kyi khyad par la 'jug stobs su 'dod/ /kun tu rtog sogs ches rno nyid ni mchog bzhed la/ /'bring gnas skabs dang rtul nyid mchog min par bshad dang/ /mig la
264a7(mdo 'grel): sogs dang phan tshun sgrub nus chub pa la/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa chags med stobs su gsungs/ /lam 'ga' rgyal ba nyid dang 'ga' zhig rang rgyal gyi/ /byang chub dang ni nyan thos byang chub yi dags dang/ /dud 'gro lha mi
264b1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang dmyal ba sogs 'gro ba/ /de la mkhyen pa chags med mdza' yas stobs su 'dod/ /'jig rten mdza' yas rnal 'byor bye brag la tha dad/ /bsam gtan mthar brgyad zhig nas gang dag dang/ /snyoms 'jug khyad par gang dag
264b2(mdo 'grel): gcig dang brgyad gyur pa/ /de la mkhyen pa thogs med 'di ni stobs su bshad/ /ji srid gti mug de srid srid gnas 'das bdag dang/ /sems can gzhan re re yi srid pa sems can ni/ /ji snyed de snyed mdza' yas bzhir bcas yul
264b3(mdo 'grel): phyogs dang/ /bcas rnams la blo gang dang gang yin stobs su bshad/ /sems can rnams kyi sems can re re'i 'chi 'pho dang/ /skye gang 'jig rten la gnas nam mkha' i mthar thug dang/ /bkra mang de la mkhyen pa dus der 'jug pa yis//
264b4(mdo 'grel): ma chags rnam kun yongs dag mdza' yas stobs su 'dod/ /rnam kun mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis myur du rgyal rnams kyi/ /nyon mongs dag ni bag ma chags dang bcas 'jig 'gyur dang/ /slob ma la sogs nyon mongs blo yis 'gog pa gang
264b5(mdo 'grel): de la mkhyen pa chags med mdza' yas stobs su 'dod/ /nam mkha' med pas 'dab chags ldog par mi 'gyur gyi/ /'dir ni rang mthu zad pas ldog par 'gyur de bzhin/ /slob ma dang bcas sangs rgyas sras rnams sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon
264b6(mdo 'grel): tan mkha' ltar mdza' yas ma brjod ldog par 'gyur/ /de phyir bdag 'dras khyod yon 'di dag ci/ /shes pa dang ni brjod par nus 'gyur ram/ /'on kyang de dag 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis/ /bshad phyir dogs spangs cung zhig tsam zhig smras//
264b7(mdo 'grel): zab mo stong pa nyid yin te/ yon tan gzhan rnams rgya che ba'o/ /zab dang rgya che'i tshul shes pas/ /yon tan 'di dag thob par 'gyur/ slar yang mi g.yo sku mda' khyod kyis srid gsum byon nas sprul rnams kyis/ /gshegs pa dang ni bltan?
265a1(mdo 'grel): dang byang chub zhi ba'i 'khor lo'ang ston par mdzad/ /de ltar khyed kyis 'jig rten g.yo bag spyod can re ba'i zhags pa ni/ /mang pos bcings pa ma lus thugs rjes mya ngan 'das par bkri bar mdzad/ /gang phyir
265a2(mdo 'grel): 'di na de nyid shes las dri ma mdza' dag sel ba ni/ /lhur byed gzhan med chos rnams de nyid rnam 'gyur dbye la'ang bsten min zhing/ /de nyid yul can blo gros 'di yang tha dad 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ /de yi phyir na khyod kyis 'gro la theg pa
265a3(mdo 'grel): mi mnyam dbyer med bstan/ /gang phyir 'gro la nyes pa skyed byed snyigs ma 'di dag yod gyur pa/ /de phyir 'jig rten sangs rgyas spyod yul gting zab la 'jug mi 'gyur zhing/ /bde gshegs gang phyir khyod la mkhyen rab thugs rje thabs
265a4(mdo 'grel): dang lhan cig pa/ /mnga' dang gang phyir bdag gis sems can dgrol zhes khyod kyis zhal bzhes te/ /de phyir mkhas pa rin po che yi gling du chas pa'i skye tshogs kyi/ /dal pa nyer sel grong khyer yid 'ong bar du rnam par bkod pa
265a5(mdo 'grel): ltar/ /khyod kyis theg pa 'di ni slob ma nye bar zhi ba'i tshul la yid/ /sbyar zhing rnam par dben la'ang blo sbyangs rnams la logs su gsungs/ /bde bar gshegs pa ma lus phyogs zhing sangs rgyas yul dag na/ /phra rab rdul gyi
265a6(mdo 'grel): rdul rnams bdog par gyur pa ji snyed pa/ /byang chub mchog rab dam par gshegs pa'i skal pa de snyed/ /'on kyang khyod kyi bsang pa 'di ni bsnyad na bgyi ma lags so/ /rgyal ba ji srid 'jig rten mdza' dag mchog tu rab zhi bar/ /'gro
265a7(mdo 'grel): ba min zhing nam mkha' rnam 'jig 'gyur min de srid du/ /shes rab yum gyis bskyed pa khyod la thugs brtse ma ma yis/ /tshul lugs byed pas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba gang la mnga' / /gti mug skyon gyis 'jig rten kha zas
265b1(mdo 'grel): dug bcas za ba yi/ /skye bo nyid kyi nang mi de la khyod brtse ji lta ba/ /de ltar dug zos nyen pa'i bu la ma yin sdug bsngal min/ /des na mgon po mchog tu rab zhing gshegs par 'gyur ma lags/ /gang gi phyir na mi mkhas dngos dang dngos
265b2(mdo 'grel): med par zhen pa yi blo can gyis/ /skye dang 'jig gnas skabs dang sdug dang mi sdug bral phrad kyis bskyed sdug bsngal dang/ /sdig can 'gro ba 'thob pa de phyir 'jig rten thugs brtse'i yul du rab deng bas/ /bcom ldan thugs rje'i khyod
265b3(mdo 'grel): lugs zhi las bzlog pas khyod la mya ngan 'das mi mnga' / /lugs 'di dge slong zla grags kyis/ /dbu ma'i bstan bcos las btus nas/ /lung ji bzhin dang man ngag ni/ /ji lta ba bzhin brjod pa yin/ /'di las gzhan na chos 'di ni/
265b4(mdo 'grel): ji ltar med pa de bzhin du/ /'dir 'byung lugs kyang gzhan ni/ /med ces mkhas rnams nges par mdzod/ /klu sgrub blo mtsho shin tu rgya che'i kha dog gis 'jigs pas/ /skye bos lugs bzang gang dag rgyang ring spangs pas de yi
265b5(mdo 'grel): tshig /le'ur byas pa'i kha 'bus ku mu da kha phye ba'i chus/ /da lta zla ba grags pa re rnams rab tu skong bar byed/ de nyid bshad zin zab mo 'jigs rung 'di ni sngon goms nyid las skye bo yis/ /nges par rtags 'gyur 'di ni gsan rgya che
265b6(mdo 'grel): yang gzhan gyis thugs su tshung mi 'gyur/ /de phyir tshul lugs rang blos sbyar ba 'di dag mthong nas bdag tu brjod pa yi/ gzhung lugs rnams ltar gzhan lugs bzhed gzhung 'di las gzhan la dga' blo dor bar bya/ /slob
265b7(mdo 'grel): dpon klu sgrub lugs bzang bsnyad las bdag gis bsod nams phyogs kyi mthar/ /khyab cing yid mkha' nyon mongs kyis sdor ston ga'i rgyu skar ltar dkar ba 'am/ /sems kyis sprul la gdengs ka'i nor bu dang 'dra gang zhig
266a1(mdo 'grel): thob pa des/ /'jig rten ma lus de nyid rtogs nas myur du bder gshegs sar bgrod shog /dbu ma la 'jug pa zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul bsal bar byed pa/ slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs
266a2(mdo 'grel): gzhol ba/ mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba/ ri mor bris pa'i ba drus ma las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba/ rdzogs so// //kha che'i yul gyi grong khyer
266a3(mdo 'grel): dpe med kyi dpung/ rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang du/ kha che'i rgyal po dpal 'phags pa la'i sku ring la/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po til ka dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba ban de pa tsa ba nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun par
266a4(mdo 'grel): bsgyur/ phyis ra sa ra mo cher rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang/ lo tsA ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs pa'i dpe dang gtugs shing legs par btsos te gtan la phab pa'o// /'dir 'grel pa'i mdzad
266a5(mdo 'grel): byed dang/ 'gyur byad gi steng nas thun mong ba rnams bkod pa ni/ rtsa ba logs su bsgyur ba dang 'grel pa'i nang gi rtsa ba gnyis sbyar nas zhus dag byas pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ (//dbu ma la 'jug pa'i rang 'gro ba bzhugs//)
266a6(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma d+hya ma kA pa tA ra b+ha Sh+yaM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbu ma'i bsnyan btsos la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ dbu
266a7(mdo 'grel): ma la 'jug pa rtsom par 'dod bas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams pas kyang thog mar/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang po/ sems can
266b1(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa skyabs med pa dpag tu med pa ma lus pa yongs su skyob pa'i ga tshan nyid can la bstong par 'os pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir/ nyan thos sangs rgyas 'bring rnams thub dbang skyes/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems
266b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' las 'khrungs shing/ /snying rje'i sems dang gnyis su med blo dang/ /byang chub sems ni rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyu/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis smos so/ /de la gong na med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug phun sum
266b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa mnga' bas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams pas kyang dbang phyug dam pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid dang/ nyan thos la sogs pa rnams de'i bkas mnga' bsgyur ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bcom
266b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams la thub dbang zhes bya'o/ /de rnams las nyan thos la sogs pa dag skyes pa ni de dag las bstan? pa'o/ /ji ltar zhe na/ sangs rgyas rnams byung par gyur pa na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci ma log pa ston pa
266b5(mdo 'grel): la 'jug pa'i phyir la/ de nyan pa dang sems pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pa las kyang lhag par mos pa ji lta ba bzhin nyan thos la sogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gal te yang kha cig gis rten cing 'brel par
266b6(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba nye bar bstan pa nyan pa kho na las don dam pa rtogs pa la mkhas su zin kyang mthong ba'i skye bo kho na la mya ngan las 'das par thob par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ /de lta na yang nye bar bstan pa'i sgrub pa po dag gis las rnam par smin
266b7(mdo 'grel): pa nges pa'i 'bras bu ster tshe rabs gzhan du mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu yongs su smin pa gong ma chag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji skad du 'phags pa lhas/ /de nyid shes pas gal te 'dir/ /mya ngan 'das pa ma thob kyang//
267a1(mdo 'grel): skye ba gzhan du 'bad med par/ /nges par thob 'gyur las bzhin no/ /zhes bshad do/ /de nyid kyi phyir dbu ma las kyang/ rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ma byung zhing/ /nyan thos rnams kyang zad pa na/ /rang sangs rgyas
267a2(mdo 'grel): kyi ye shes ni/ /brten pa med par rab tu 'byung/ zhes gsungs so/ /de la yang dag pa'i gdam ngag gi 'bras bu thob par byed pas na nyan thos dag ste/ /'di ltar bya ba byas so 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba la sogs
267a3(mdo 'grel): pa 'byung ba yin no/ /yang na 'bras bu'i mchog gam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las thos nas don du gnyer ba rnams la sgrogs par byed pas na nyan thos dag ste/
267a4(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las/ mgon po de ring bdag cag nyan thos gyur/ /byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrags par bgyi/ /byang chub pa yi sgra yang rab tu brjod/ /de bas bdag cag nyan thos mi bzad 'dra/ /zhes ji skad
267a5(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de ltar yin mod kyi/ de lta na yang sgrogs par byed pa nyid yin gyi rjes su mthun pa tsam yang mi sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag nyan thos yin pas byang chub sems dpa' 
267a6(mdo 'grel): rnams las thal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'di sangs rgyas kyis de nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsum char la yang 'jug ste/ /des na sangs rgyas kyis sgras
267a7(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas dag bsnyed do/ /de dag ni bsod nams dang ye shes gong du 'phel ba'i khyad par gyis nyan thos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir dang/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang thugs rje chen po
267b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams pas dman pa'i phyir na 'bring ngo/ /de nyid kyi phyir de dag ni nye bar ma bstan par ye shes 'byung zhing bdag nyid gcig pu'i phyir
267b2(mdo 'grel): rang nyid sangs rgyas pas rang sangs rgyas so/ /ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa las nges par 'byung ba nyid kyis phyir thub dbang las skyes so/ /yang thub
267b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbang po de rnams gang las bltam zhe na/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs shing/ /zhes bya ba smos so/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pas nye bar bstan pa las skyes par gyur pas rgyal ba'i sras
267b4(mdo 'grel): zhes brjod pa ma yin nam/ de'i phyir ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs shin/ 'di ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang rgyu gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
267b5(mdo 'grel): rgyur 'gyur te/ gnas skabs kyis khyad par dang/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa las so/ /de la gnas skabs kyi khyad par las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas skabs ni byang chub sems dpa' i gnas skabs kyis rgyu can yin pa nyid kyi
267b6(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa las ni ji ltar 'phags pa 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/ de las gzhan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thog ma kho nar byang chub kyi sems
267b7(mdo 'grel): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'don pa yin no/ /de'i phyir de ltar 'bras bu mthar thug pa de'i rgyu gtso bor gyur pa las bltos nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' las 'khrungs bar bstan to/ /de nyid kyi phyir rgyu phun sum
268a1(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa chos brling ba yin pa'i phyir la/ rgyu la mchod pa brjod pas kyang 'bras bu la mchod pa don gyis 'phangs par dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sman gyi ljon shing chen po 'bras bu nges
268a2(mdo 'grel): pa dpag tu med pa ster ba/ /myu gu la sogs pa mtho zhing lo ma 'jam pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa ltar bsgrims te yongs su bskyed par bya ba nyid du bstan par bya zhing/ dus der nye bar gyur zhing theg pa gsum la bkod pa'i sems can
268a3(mdo 'grel): gyi phung po theg pa chen po nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa mdzad pa yin no/ /ji skad du 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na zla ba tshes pa la phyag 'tshal
268a4(mdo 'grel): ba ltar nya ba la ni ma yin no/ /'od srungs de bzhin du gang dag nga la rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las ni
268a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung ngo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de'i phyir de ltar na rigs pa dang lung dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems
268a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' las 'khrungs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di bsgrubs pa yin no/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ci'i rgyu can zhig yin zhe na/ snying rje'i sems dang gnyis su med blo dang/ byang chub sems ni rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyu/ /zhes bya ba smos so//
268a7(mdo 'grel): de la snying rje ni brtse ba ste/ 'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa dang rang gi ngo bo can no/ gnyis su med pa'i blo ni/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa mdza' gnyis dang bral ba'i shes rab bo/ /byang chub kyi sems ni 'phags
268b1(mdo 'grel): pa chos kun 'gro ba'i mdo las/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi sems las chos thams cad khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o/ glo bur du byung ba mi gnas pa chos thams cad ni shes par bgyi ba tsam dang
268b2(mdo 'grel): shes pa pos stong pa'i phyir yongs su shes par bgyi ba tsam du bas na chos nyid 'di lta bu 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du chud par bya'o snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ? sems gang skye ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i byang chub kyi sems
268b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems dang/ /bla na med pa'i sems dang/ byams pas mnyen pa'i sems dang/ snying rjes mi zlog pa'i sems dang/ dga' bas bgyod pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang/ btang snyoms
268b4(mdo 'grel): kyi dri ma mchis pa'i sems dang/ stong pa nyid kyis mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang/ mtshan ma ma mchis pas sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang/ /smon pa ma mchis las mi gnas pa'i sems zhes ji skad bstan pa bzhin no/ /byang chub sems
268b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo'i rgyu ni snying rje dang/ gnyis su med pa'i shes rab dang/ byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba chos gsum po 'di dag yin no/ /ji skad du rin po che'i phreng pa las de yi rtsa ba byang chub sems/ /ri dbang rgyal po ltar brtan
268b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /phyogs mthas gtugs pa'i snying rje dang/ /gnyis la mi brten ye shes lags/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems dang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes gnyis kyi rtsa ba yang snying rje yin pa'i phyir na snying rje gtso bo nyid du bstan
268b7(mdo 'grel): par 'dod pas/ gang phyir brtse nyid rgyal ba'i lo thog phun tshogs 'di'i/ /sa bon dang ni spel la chu 'dra yun ring du/ /longs spyod gnas la smin pa lta bur 'dod gyur pa/ /de phyir bdag gis thog mar snying rje bstod par bgyi/ /zhes smos
269a1(mdo 'grel): so/ /ji ltar phyi rol gyis 'brul sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa la/ thog ma dang bar dang tham rnams su sa bon dang chu dang smin pa rnams gtso bo nyid du gyur pas nye bar mkho ba nyid yin pa de bzhin du/ snying rjes ?
269a2(mdo 'grel): dus gsum bar du yang rgyal ba'i lo thog phun sum tshogs pa la nye bar mkho ba nyid du ston pa yin no/ /'di ltar snying rje can ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa ma lus pa yongs
269a3(mdo 'grel): su bskyab bar bya ba'i phyir/ gdon mi za bar bdag gis 'jig rten 'di mdza' dag sdug bsngal nas bton te sangs rgyas nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya'o snyam du nges par sems bskyed par byed do/ /dam bca' ba 'di yang gnyis su med
269a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i ye shes spangs pas sgrub par mi nus pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la yang nges pa kho nar 'jug ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon ni snying rje nyid yin no/ /ji skad du rin po che'i phreng ba las/ /theg pa chen
269a5(mdo 'grel): po gang zhig nas/ /snying rje sngon btang spyod pa kun/ /ye shes dri ma med bshad pa/ /sems yongs su zhig de la yod/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed du zin kyang/ gal te dus phyis snying rje'i chus yang dang yang du bcus
269a6(mdo 'grel): par ma gyur na/ 'bras bu'i tshogs yangs pa ma bsags pa 'di nges par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu mdza' yas pa'i gnas skabs thob tu
269a7(mdo 'grel): zin kyang gal te snying rje'i yongs su smin pa dang bral par gyur na ni 'di dus ring por nye bar longs spyod par mi 'gyur la/ /'phags pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po rim pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par ma chad pa yun ring
269b1(mdo 'grel): por mngon par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /da ni dmigs pa'i bye brag la 'jug pa'i sgo nas kyang snying rje'i rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par gsal bar byas te de nyid la phyag 'tshal ba brtsam par 'dod pas/ dang por de zhes bdag la zhen gyur zhing//
269b2(mdo 'grel): bdag gi 'di zhes dngos la chags pa skyed pa/ zo chun chen ltar rang dbang med pa yi/ /'gro la snying rjer gyur gang de la 'dud/ /ces bya ba smos so/ /'jig rten 'di ni bdag gir mngon par zhen pa'i snga rol nyid du ngar 'dzin pas yod pa ma yin pa'i
269b3(mdo 'grel): bdag yod do snyam du nye bar brtags nas 'di nyid du bden par mngon par zhen zhing/ 'di ni bdag gi'o snyam du ngar 'dzin pa'i yul las gzhan pa'i dngos po'i rnam pa ma lus pa la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /bdag dang bdag gir mngon
269b4(mdo 'grel): par zhen pa'i 'jig rten 'di ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i thag pas ches dam du bsdams pa/ /'khrul 'khor skor mkhan rnam par shes pa'i bskyod pa la rag las bar 'jug pa/ 'khor ba'i khron pa chen po srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa la
269b5(mdo 'grel): thug pa zags par med par 'phyan pa/ rang gi rang nyid kyis mthur du 'gro bar 'jug pa 'bad pas ci zhig ltar drang par bya ba mi shes pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum yod kyang snga ma
269b6(mdo 'grel): dang phyi ma dang zhag mi rim pa nges par mi zin pa/ nyi ma re re zhing sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang/ 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dag gis gcog pa'i phyir zo chun khyud mo'i gnas skabs las ma 'das par gnas pa zhig ste/ gang
269b7(mdo 'grel): gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis de la shin tu snying rjes dmigs nas bskyab bar spro ba de'i phyir ches thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di ni byang
270a1(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis snying rje sems can la dmigs pa'o/ /chos la dmigs pa dang dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje yang dmigs pa'i sgo nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba g.yo ba'i chu yi
270a2(mdo 'grel): nang gi zla ba ltar/ g.yo dang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong par mthong ba yi/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ snying rjer gyur gang de la 'dud ces bya ba de dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /'di ltar chu shin tu dang ba rlung te bor drag pa ma yin pas cha shas brlabs pas
270a3(mdo 'grel): khyab pa'i nang du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan sngar dmigs pa brten gyi yul dang/ lhan cig 'jig pa de dag gi dngos po mngon sum du dmigs pa lta bur shar ba na/ dam pa dag gis gnyis po 'di rang gi bdag nyid gsal bar
270a4(mdo 'grel): byed pa ltar gnas par mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ skad cig re re la mi rtag pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur ba rnams kyis kyang sems can 'jig
270a5(mdo 'grel): tshogs la lta ba'i mtsho/ /ma rig pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i ro phul du byung ba'i rgyu/ phyin ci log gi rtog pa mdza' dag pa'i mtshan nyid/ 'gro ba yongs kyi/ ma rig pa'i chu sngon po rgya che ba tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i
270a6(mdo 'grel): rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa'i nang na gnas pa rang gi las kyi gzugs brnyan lta bur mdun na gnas pa rnams skad cig re re la mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal thog tu 'bab pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong ba na/ /de dag gi
270a7(mdo 'grel): mi rtag pa nyid kyi sdug bsngal 'joms pa lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i ro phul du 'byung ba'i rgyu/ phyin ci log gi rtog pa mdza' dag log pa'i mtshan nyid/ 'gro ba yongs kyi gnyen nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur
270b1(mdo 'grel): pa sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par thob par 'dod pa yin no/ /de dag gi snying rje sems can la dmigs pa dang/ chos la dmigs pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa gang yin pa de rnams la rab tu btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi
270b2(mdo 'grel): dbye ba rnam pa bcu brjod par 'dod pas/ je byang chub kyi sems dang po'i dbang du byas nas/ rgyal pa'i sras po 'di yi sems gang 'gro ba rnams/ /rnam par grol bar bya phyir snying rje'i dbang gyur cing/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon pas
270b3(mdo 'grel): rab sngos dga' ba la/ /rab tu gnas pa de ni dang po zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba smos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i ye shes snying rje la sogs pas yongs su zin pa nyid car rnam par phye ba nas zhes bya ba'i
270b4(mdo 'grel): ming 'thob ste/ yon tan gyi rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang gong nas gong du yon tan gyi grangs dang/ mthu phul du byung ba thob pa dang/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa klags pa dang/ rnam par smin pa 'phel ba'i bye brag gis sa rab tu dga'
